Umineko Project (UP): The guesthouse lobby had been engulfed by silence.
Steam (ST): The guesthouse lobby was wrapped in silence.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The guesthouse lobby was wrapped in silence.
PC Japanese (JP): ゲストハウスのロビーは静寂に包まれていた。
Russian (RU): В вестибюле домика для гостей царила тишина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O lobby da casa de hóspedes foi engolido pelo silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 靜寂包圍著賓館的大廳。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 静寂包围着宾馆的大厅。

Umineko Project (UP): The strings of tension which bound Krauss, Natsuhi, and Eva had already loosened; they were completely tired; and their consciousness was beginning to waver.
Steam (ST): The strings of tension binding Krauss, Natsuhi, and Eva had already loosened, and they were completely worn out, with their minds beginning to waver.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The strings of tension which bound Krauss, Natsuhi, and Eva had already loosened, they were completely tired, and their consciousness was beginning to waver.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼、夏妃、絵羽の３人はもはや緊張感の糸も弛み、疲れきって、意識を朦朧とさせている。
Russian (RU): Нити напряжения, связывавшие Краусса, Нацухи и Еву, уже ослабли, они были полностью измотаны, а их сознание расплывалось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As cordas de tensão que vinculavam Krauss, Natsuhi e Eva já haviam se desprendido; eles estavam completamente exaustos; e suas consciências estavam começando a vacilar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼、夏妃、繪羽三人的緊張感都已有所鬆懈，他們疲憊到了極點，意識趨於朦朧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼、夏妃、绘羽三人的紧张感都已有所松懈，他们疲惫到了极点，意识趋于朦胧。

Umineko Project (UP): Every once in a while, they would stand up and walk around pointlessly, fighting their drowsiness.
Steam (ST): Every once in a while, they would stand up and walk around pointlessly, as though fighting their drowsiness.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Every once in a while, they would stand up and walk around pointlessly, as though fighting their drowsiness.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼らは時折、席を立ち、無意味に歩き回ったりすることで眠気と戦っているようだった。
Russian (RU): Время от времени они поднимались и бессмысленно слонялись, словно это помогало им одолеть сонливость.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De tempos em tempos, eles se levantavam e andavam sem rumo, lutando contra a sonolência.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來，他們是在通過時而站起身來，無目的地隨便亂走，來與睡意較著勁。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来，他们是在通过时而站起身来，无目的地随便乱走，来与睡意较着劲。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Are you alright, Eva‐san? ...Please, do take it easy and rest."
Steam (ST): "......Are you okay, Eva-san? ...Please, do take it easy and rest."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Are you alright, Eva-san? ...Please, do take it easy and rest."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………大丈夫ですか、絵羽さん。…やはり無理をせず、休んでいてください。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………大丈夫ですか、絵羽さん。…やはり無理をせず、休んでいてください」
Russian (RU): ".........С тобой всё в порядке, Ева‐сан? ...Пожалуйста, успокойся и отдохни."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Você está bem, Eva‐san? ...Por favor, não se force tanto e descanse."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………還好嗎，繪羽？…請還是別勉強了，去歇著吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………还好吗，绘羽？…请还是别勉强了，去歇着吧。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "I told you, I'm fine...... ...The three of us are now the only adults... There's no time to rest... I'll guard this place even if I have to go through hell and high water...... ......haah......haah......"
Steam (ST): "I told you, I'm fine... ...The three of us are now the only adults... There's no time to rest... No matter what the cost, we must guard this place until the end... ...Haah, ...haah..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I told you, I'm fine.........The three of us are now the only adults... There's no time to rest... No matter what the cost, we must guard this place until the end............Haah, ......haah......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「大丈夫だって言ってるわ……。…もう、大人は私たち３人しかいないのよ…。休んでる暇なんかないわ…。石にかじりついてでも、ここを死守するわよ……。……はぁ、……はぁ……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「大丈夫だって言ってるわ……。…もう、大人は私たち３人しかいないのよ…。休んでる暇なんかないわ…。石にかじりついてでも、ここを死守するわよ……。……はぁ、……はぁ……」
Russian (RU): "Я же сказала тебе, я в порядке...... ...Теперь нас лишь трое взрослых... Нет никакого времени на отдых... Чего бы нам это ни стоило, мы должны до последнего охранять это место...... ......Ха‐а... ха‐а..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu já disse que estou bem......! ...Nós três somos os únicos adultos... Não há tempo para descansarmos... Irei vigiar este lugar a qualquer custo, mesmo que seja preciso atravessar o Inferno...... ......haah......haah......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都說了沒事……。…就只剩我們三個大人了喲…。才沒工夫去歇著呢…。就算是硬著頭皮，也要死守此處……。……哈啊，……哈啊……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「都说了没事……。…就只剩我们三个大人了哟…。才没工夫去歇着呢…。就算是硬着头皮，也要死守此处……。……哈啊，……哈啊……」

Umineko Project (UP): She spoke a brave line, but she couldn't hide her rough breathing.{n}...It seemed that the fever, which had been calmed with medicine for a time, had returned.
Steam (ST): She spoke bravely, but she couldn't hide her rough breathing. ...It seemed that the fever, which had been calmed with medicine for a short time, had returned.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She spoke a brave line, but she couldn't hide her rough breathing....It seemed that the fever, which had been calmed with medicine for a time, had returned.
PC Japanese (JP): 勇ましい台詞を口にするが、荒い息は隠せていない。…一度は薬で落ち着いた熱だったが、再びぶり返してきたらしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 勇ましい台詞を口にするが、荒い息は隠せていない。{n}…一度は薬で落ち着いた熱だったが、再びぶり返してきたらしい。
Russian (RU): Она говорила уверенным тоном, но ей было не под силу скрыть своё затруднённое дыхание.{n}...Судя по всему температура, на время сбитая лекарством, снова поднялась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela falou algo bravo, mas incapaz de esconder sua respiração ofegante.{n}...Parece que a febre, que havia diminuído com os medicamentos, havia retornado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然說著豪言壯語，但她並沒有藏住急促的呼吸。{n}…看來是再度發起了，一度因藥而穩定下來的高燒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然说着豪言壮语，但她并没有藏住急促的呼吸。{n}…看来是再度发起了，一度因药而稳定下来的高烧。

Umineko Project (UP): It was very obvious that Eva's condition was not good.
Steam (ST): It was very obvious that Eva's health was not good.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was very obvious that Eva's health was not good.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽の体調が悪いのは一目瞭然だった。
Russian (RU): Было вполне очевидно, что Еве явно нездоровится.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Estava claro que as condições de Eva não eram boas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽那糟糕的身體狀況一看便知。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽那糟糕的身体状况一看便知。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't push yourself. At least close your eyes. If we have to wake you, we definitely will."
Steam (ST): "Take it easy. At least close your eyes. If something happens that you need to be awake for, we will definitiely wake you."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Take it easy. At least close your eyes. Because if we have to wake you, we definitely will."
PC Japanese (JP): 「無理はするな。せめて目を閉じていたまえ。もし、起こさねばならぬ時は必ず起こしてやるから。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「無理はするな。せめて目を閉じていたまえ。もし、起こさねばならぬ時は必ず起こしてやるから」
Russian (RU): "Не напрягайся. Хотя бы закрой глаза. Поскольку если нам потребуется разбудить тебя, мы обязательно это сделаем."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não se esforce demais. Ao menos feche seus olhos. Se precisamos acordá‐la, certamente o faremos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「別硬撐了。至少去合會兒眼吧。如果有必須叫你起來的情況，一定會來叫醒你的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「别硬撑了。至少去合会儿眼吧。如果有必须叫你起来的情况，一定会来叫醒你的。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm telling you that I'm fine...! Leave me alone......!!"
Steam (ST): "I'm telling you I'm fine...! Leave me alone...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「だから平気だって言ってるわ…！　放っておいて……！！」
Russian (RU): "Говорю же тебя, я в порядке!.. Оставь меня в покое!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Estou dizendo que estou bem...! Me deixem sozinha......!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我不說了沒事了嘛…！別管我……！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我不说了没事了嘛…！别管我……！！」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Russian (RU): [=OG]
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): [=JPC]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that she had now become stubborn. ......Krauss and Natsuhi realized that no matter what else they said to her, in her current state, it wouldn't reach her ears.
Steam (ST): It seemed she was already unwilling to budge. ...Krauss and Natsuhi realized that even if they talked to her any more when she was like this, it wouldn't reach her ears.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed that she had already become obstinate.......Krauss and Natsuhi realized that even if they talked to her any more when she was like this, it wouldn't reach her ears.
PC Japanese (JP): もはや意地になっているようだった。……今の彼女には、これ以上、何を言っても耳に届かないだろうことを、蔵臼たちも悟る。
Russian (RU): Похоже, её упрямство сейчас достигло своего предела. ......Краусс и Нацухи поняли, что даже если они продолжат уговаривать её, то пока она пребывает в таком состоянии, их слова пройдут мимо её ушей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parece que ela se tornou um incômodo agora. ......Krauss e Natsuhi perceberam que não importava o que fosse dito para ela, em seu estado atual, não chegaria aos seus ouvidos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來是徹底鐵了心了。……藏臼夫婦也意識到了，不管再說什麼，都是不會傳進現今的她的耳朵裡的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来是彻底铁了心了。……藏臼夫妇也意识到了，不管再说什么，都是不会传进现今的她的耳朵里的。

Umineko Project (UP): So they decided to say nothing more, and to let her be.
Steam (ST): So without saying anything more, they decided to let her be.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So without saying anything more, they decided to let her be.
PC Japanese (JP): だからそれ以上は何も言わず、そっとしておくことにした。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, больше не сказав ни слова, они решили оставить её в покое.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso eles decidiram não dizer mais nada, e deixá‐la a sós.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，他們就此不再說話，隨她去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，他们就此不再说话，随她去了。

Umineko Project (UP): To Eva right now, even an argument like that was putting a burden on her.{n}It would probably be better for her if she just sat there with her mouth closed.
Steam (ST): To Eva right now, even having an argument like that would be burdensome. It would probably be better for her body if she just sat there with her mouth closed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): To Eva right now, even an argument like that became a burden. It would probably be better if she just sat there with her mouth closed.
PC Japanese (JP): 今の絵羽には、そんな口論すらも負担になっている。口を閉ざし、ただ静かに座っているだけの方が、まだ体に楽だろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 今の絵羽には、そんな口論すらも負担になっている。{n}口を閉ざし、ただ静かに座っているだけの方が、まだ体に楽だろう。
Russian (RU): Для Евы в данный момент было болезненно даже спорить с ними.{n}Вероятно, было бы лучше, если бы она просто сидела с закрытым ртом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para Eva, naquele momento, mesmo um argumento como aquele jogava um peso para cima dela. Provavelmente seria melhor se ela apenas se sentasse e ficasse em silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對現在的繪羽而言，就連吵嘴都成了身體的負擔。{n}閉上嘴，只是靜靜地坐著，倒還能讓身體舒服些。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对现在的绘羽而言，就连吵嘴都成了身体的负担。{n}闭上嘴，只是静静地坐着，倒还能让身体舒服些。

Umineko Project (UP): As a matter of fact, Eva was already on the point of succumbing to her drowsiness. ...She might have talked back with a temper because she was trying to encourage herself and throw off her sleepiness.
Steam (ST): In truth, Eva was just a step away from being beaten down by drowsiness. ...Perhaps she shot back at them with a temper because she was trying to rouse herself and throw off her sleepiness.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Actually, Eva was already being beaten down by drowsiness....She might have talked back with a temper because she was trying to encourage herself and throw off her sleepiness.
PC Japanese (JP): 実際、絵羽はもう眠気に挫けようとしている。…短気に言い返すのは、自らを鼓舞して眠気を飛ばすためなのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): На самом деле Ева уже не могла противостоять сонливости. ...Причиной её вспыльчивых ответов, вероятно, являлась попытка взбодрить себя и прогнать сонливость.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De fato, Eva já estava no limite de sucumbir à sonolência. ...Ela possivelmente havia respondido daquela maneira porque estava tentando encorajar a si mesma e dispersar seu sono.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 其實，繪羽已經快輸給睡意了。…她暴躁地還嘴，或許是為了鼓起自己的精神頭，趕走睡意也說不定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 其实，绘羽已经快输给睡意了。…她暴躁地还嘴，或许是为了鼓起自己的精神头，赶走睡意也说不定。

Umineko Project (UP): The clock would very soon be pointing to six in the afternoon.
Steam (ST): The clock would be pointing to 6:00 in the afternoon very soon.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The clock would be pointing to 6:00 in the afternoon very soon.
PC Japanese (JP): 時計は、もうじき午後の６時を指そうとしている。
Russian (RU): Часы должны были показывать шесть в ближайшее время.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O relógio estava para bater seis da tarde.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 時鐘已快指向下午六點。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 时钟已快指向下午六点。

Umineko Project (UP): Because she had been snacking over and over again to fool her drowsiness, she didn't feel hungry, but instead, her lack of sleep made it feel like it was six in the morning rather than the afternoon.
Steam (ST): She'd had several snacks to distract herself from her drowsiness, so she didn't feel hungry, but now her lack of sleep made it feel like it was 6:00 in the morning, not the afternoon.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because she had been snacking over and over again to fool her drowsiness, she didn't feel hungry, but instead, her lack of sleep made it feel like it was 6:00 in the morning, not the afternoon.
PC Japanese (JP): 眠気を誤魔化すために、何度も間食を取ったせいで空腹感はなく、むしろ寝不足のせいで、午後どころか明け方の６時のようにさえ感じられた。
Russian (RU): Поскольку она всё ела и ела, чтобы обмануть свою сонливость, она не ощущала голода, наоборот, недосыпание заставило её думать, будто сейчас шесть утра, а не вечера.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por ter beliscado pequenos lanches em diversos momentos para combater a sonolência, ela não estava com fome, mas, por outro lado, sua falta de sono fez parecer que eram seis da manhã e não seis da tarde.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為了壓下睡意吃了好幾次點心，所以肚子一點都不餓，倒不如說，因為缺乏睡眠，別說是下午了，甚至感覺現在像是凌晨六點。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为了压下睡意吃了好几次点心，所以肚子一点都不饿，倒不如说，因为缺乏睡眠，别说是下午了，甚至感觉现在像是凌晨六点。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Even supposing that the boat would come at precisely nine in the morning tomorrow, ......there were still more than twelve full hours to go.
Steam (ST): ...Even supposing that the boat came at precisely 9:00 in the morning tomorrow, ...they still had more than 12 full hours to go.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Even if they supposed that the boat came at precisely 9:00 in the morning tomorrow, ......there was still more than 12 full hours to go.
PC Japanese (JP): ……明日の朝の９時にぴったりに船が来てくれると仮定しても、……まだ１２時間以上たっぷりある。
Russian (RU): ......Даже если по их предположениям катер должен был явиться в девять утра завтрашнего дня... Требовалось прождать ещё полных 12 часов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mesmo supondo que o barco chegaria precisamente às nove da manhã do dia seguinte, ......ainda havia mais de doze horas até lá.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……即便假定船會一秒不差地在明天早上九點到來，……也還有漫長的十二個多小時。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……即便假定船会一秒不差地在明天早上九点到来，……也还有漫长的十二个多小时。

Umineko Project (UP): ...That was a dizzyingly long stretch of time.
Steam (ST): ...It was an overwhelmingly long stretch of time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...That was an overwhelmingly long stretch of time.
PC Japanese (JP): …気の遠くなるような時間だった。
Russian (RU): ...Это был невероятно длинный отрезок времени.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Era um logo e vertiginoso tempo a ser superado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這是一段令人犯暈的漫長時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这是一段令人犯晕的漫长时间。

Russian (RU): ............Долгий. .........Болезненный... ......Жаркий...

Umineko Project (UP): Even the sound of the clock torments my body now.
Steam (ST): Even the sound of the clock torments my body now.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even the sound of the clock torments my body now.
PC Japanese (JP): 時計の音さえ、今はこの身を苛む。
Russian (RU): Даже звук часов теперь, кажется, истязает моё тело.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo o som do relógio atormenta meu corpo agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此刻，就連時鐘的聲音，都在折磨著這具身軀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此刻，就连时钟的声音，都在折磨着这具身躯。

Umineko Project (UP): In times like this, ......he would put his hand on my forehead, and the fever would always fade at once.
Steam (ST): In times like this, ...when that person puts his hand on my forehead, the fever fades at once.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In times like this, ......when that person puts his hand on my forehead, the fever fades at once.
PC Japanese (JP): こんな時はいつだって、……あの人が私の額に手を当ててくれれば、たちどころに熱が引いたのに。
Russian (RU): В такие моменты... Когда этот человек кладёт мне руку на лоб, весь жар сразу же проходит.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em horas como essa, ......ele colocaria sua mão na minha testa, e a febre iria começar a desaparecer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 每當這種時候，……只要他將手搭在我的額頭上，就會馬上退燒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 每当这种时候，……只要他将手搭在我的额头上，就会马上退烧。

Umineko Project (UP): ...But he isn't here anymore.........
Steam (ST): ...But that person no longer exists......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...But that person no longer exists.........
PC Japanese (JP): …でももう、あの人はいない………。
Russian (RU): ...Но этого человека больше нет...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas ele não está mais aqui.........
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …可是，他已經不在了………。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …可是，他已经不在了………。

Umineko Project (UP): As Eva's mind grew foggy, she was once again gripped by a deep sadness...
Steam (ST): As Eva's mind grew foggy, she was once again gripped by a deep sadness...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Eva's mind grew foggy, she was once again gripped by a deep sadness...
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽は朦朧とした意識の中で、再び深い悲しみに囚われていた…。
Russian (RU): Разум Евы затуманился, и её снова охватила глубокая печаль...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A mente de Eva ficava cada vez mais nebulosa, e mais uma vez ela era consumida por uma profunda tristeza...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽在朦朧的意識中，再次陷入了深深的悲傷裡…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽在朦胧的意识中，再次陷入了深深的悲伤里…。

Umineko Project (UP): She had already cried herself dry.{n}Even so, the sadness from losing her beloved husband had not been exhausted...
Steam (ST): She had already cried herself dry. Even so, the sadness of losing her beloved husband had not been exhausted...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had already cried herself dry. Even so, the sadness from losing her beloved husband had not been exhausted...
PC Japanese (JP): もう涙は枯れ果てた。それでも最愛の夫を失った悲しみが、尽き果てない…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): もう涙は枯れ果てた。{n}それでも最愛の夫を失った悲しみが、尽き果てない…。

Umineko Project (UP): "410, data received, firing permission confirmed. Nihihihihi, firing!"
Steam (ST): "410, Data Received, Firing Permission Confirmed. Nihihihihi, Firing!"

Umineko Project (UP): Together, the sisters released the readied magic bowstring. A beautiful tail trailed the golden arrow, and it drew a beautiful curve as it flew.
Steam (ST): Together, the sisters released the magical bowstring they had readied. A beautiful tail trailed behind the gold arrow, and it drew a lovely curve as it flew.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Together, the sisters released the readied magic bowstring. A beautiful tail trailed the gold arrow, and it drew a beautiful curve as it flew.
PC Japanese (JP): 姉妹が二人で引く魔法の弦を放つ。黄金の矢が美しい尾を引き、美しい曲線を描きながら飛んでいく。
Russian (RU): Сёстры совместно спустили подготовленную магическую тетиву. Оставляя за собой красивый хвост, стрела, летя, рисовала прекрасную кривую.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Juntas, as irmãs soltaram a corda do arco que estava apontado. Uma bela cauda foi disparada do arco dourado, desenhando uma magnífica curva enquanto voava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 姐妹兩人一同放開了拉緊的魔法弓弦。黃金之箭拖著美麗的尾巴，描繪著美麗的曲線，飛馳而去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 姐妹两人一同放开了拉紧的魔法弓弦。黄金之箭拖着美丽的尾巴，描绘着美丽的曲线，飞驰而去。

Umineko Project (UP): It was just like a golden snake.
Steam (ST): It was just like a gold snake.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was just like a gold snake.
PC Japanese (JP): それはさながら、黄金の蛇。
Russian (RU): Она была очень похожа на золотого змея.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era como uma cobra dourada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 它猶如一條黃金蛇。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 它犹如一条黄金蛇。

Umineko Project (UP): It skillfully avoided a grove of trees and flew towards the front door of the guesthouse.
Steam (ST): It skillfully avoided a grove of trees and flew towards the front door of the guesthouse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It skillfully avoided a grove of trees and flew towards the front door of the guesthouse.
PC Japanese (JP): それは器用に木立を避けて飛び、ゲストハウスの玄関を目指す。
Russian (RU): Он ловко избегал деревьев и летел прямо в направлении входной двери домика для гостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Habilmente desviou da alameda de árvores e seguiu voando em direção à porta da frente da casa de hóspedes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 靈敏地躲開樹木，飛向了賓館正門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 灵敏地躲开树木，飞向了宾馆正门。

Umineko Project (UP): Then it flew into the keyhole of the door and snuck into the guesthouse without any problem at all.
Steam (ST): Then it flew into the keyhole of the door and snuck into the guesthouse without any problem at all.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then it flew into the keyhole of the door and snuck into the guesthouse without any problem at all.
PC Japanese (JP): そして扉の鍵穴に飛び込むと、何の問題もないかのようにゲストハウス内に侵入した。
Russian (RU): Затем он влетел прямо в замочную скважину двери и пробрался в домик для гостей без каких либо проблем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então voou para dentro da fechadura da porta e se infiltrou dentro da casa de hóspedes sem qualquer dificuldade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後鑽進了門上的鑰匙孔，毫無問題地侵入了賓館。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后钻进了门上的钥匙孔，毫无问题地侵入了宾馆。

Umineko Project (UP): The gold snake raced down the hall smoothly, yet as fast as an arrow.
Steam (ST): The gold snake raced down the hall smoothly, yet as fast as an arrow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The gold snake raced down the hall smoothly, yet as fast as an arrow.
PC Japanese (JP): 廊下をするすると、だけれども矢の如き素早さで黄金の蛇が疾駆する。
Russian (RU): Золотой змей начал плавно лететь по коридору, но так же быстро, как и стрела.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A cobra de ouro rastejou suavemente pelo corredor, veloz como uma flecha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 儘管黃金蛇在走廊上滑行著，但其疾馳的速度卻快如箭矢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 尽管黄金蛇在走廊上滑行着，但其疾驰的速度却快如箭矢。

Umineko Project (UP): Right in front of it was the door to the lobby.
Steam (ST): Right before it was the door to the lobby.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Right before it was the door to the lobby.
PC Japanese (JP): その正面にはロビーの扉。
Russian (RU): Пока не достиг двери, ведущей в вестибюль.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Bem a sua frente estava a porta para o lobby.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 其正前方是大廳的門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 其正前方是大厅的门。

Umineko Project (UP): It would only need to fly into that keyhole, and Krauss and Natsuhi would be right there...
Steam (ST): When it flew into the key hole, Krauss and Natsuhi were already...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When it flew into the key hole, Krauss and Natsuhi were already...
PC Japanese (JP): その鍵穴に飛び込んだなら、そこにはもう蔵臼と夏妃が…。
Russian (RU): Когда он влетел в замочную скважину, Краусс и Нацухи были уже...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Precisava apenas voar para dentro da fechadura, e Krauss e Natsuhi estariam bem ali...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鑽進了鑰匙孔，就已意味著到了藏臼與夏妃的跟前…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 钻进了钥匙孔，就已意味着到了藏臼与夏妃的跟前…。

Umineko Project (UP): For an instant, Krauss thought he saw the door's keyhole sparkle gold.
Steam (ST): For an instant, Krauss thought he saw a gold-colored sparkle in the keyhole on the door.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For an instant, Krauss thought he saw a gold-colored sparkle in the keyhole on the door.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼は、扉の鍵穴が一瞬、金色に輝いたような気がした。
Russian (RU): На один миг, Краусс всё же успел заметить золотой блеск в замочной скважине двери.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por um instante, Krauss pensou ter visto um brilho dourado na fechadura da porta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼感覺門上的鑰匙孔好像閃了一下金光。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼感觉门上的钥匙孔好像闪了一下金光。

Umineko Project (UP): However, at the same time he strained his eyes to see what it was, that sparkle bent like a whip and attacked, wrapping itself around Krauss's neck.
Steam (ST): However, at the same time as he strained his eyes to see what it was, that sparkle bent like a whip and attacked, wrapping itself around Krauss's neck.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, at the same time he strained his eyes to see what it was, that sparkle bent like a whip and attacked, wrapping itself around Krauss's neck.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、それが何かと目を細めるのと同時に、その輝きが鞭のようにしなって襲い掛かり、蔵臼の首にぐるぐるっと巻きつく。
Russian (RU): Однако как только он напряг зрение, чтобы получше разглядеть возникший раздражитель, этот золотой блеск тут же изогнулся подобно кнуту и напал, намотав себя на шею Краусса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, no mesmo momento em que ele virou os olhos para ver o que era, aquele brilho se curvou como um chicote e o atacou, enroscando‐se em volta do pescoço de Krauss.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，在他眯起眼睛細看那是什麼的同時，這道金光化作鞭子迎面撲來，一圈圈地卷住了藏臼的脖子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，在他眯起眼睛细看那是什么的同时，这道金光化作鞭子迎面扑来，一圈圈地卷住了藏臼的脖子。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): Just looking at it, the gold snake looked very supple. However, it was as though a wire had tightened around Krauss's neck.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 見ただけなら、黄金の蛇はとてもしなやかそう。しかし、蔵臼の首はまるで、針金で締め上げられるかのようだった。
Russian (RU): На первый взгляд золотой змей казался очень эластичным. Однако он, подобно проволоке, затянулся на шее Краусса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Apenas olhando, a cobra de ouro parecia ser bem flexível. Contudo, era como se um arame estivesse apertando o pescoço de Krauss.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一眼看過去，會覺得黃金蛇非常地柔軟。然而，藏臼的脖子卻好似被鋼絲勒緊了一般。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一眼看过去，会觉得黄金蛇非常地柔软。然而，藏臼的脖子却好似被钢丝勒紧了一般。

Umineko Project (UP): And while that snake choked Krauss, it extended even more, and also tightened around Natsuhi's neck.
Steam (ST): And while that snake choked Krauss, it extended even more, and also tightened around Natsuhi's neck.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And while that snake choked Krauss, it extended even more, and also tightened around Natsuhi's neck.

Russian (RU): В тот момент, когда змей душил Краусса, он удлинился ещё больше и так же обмотался вокруг шеи Нацухи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto a cobra estrangulava Krauss, ela se estendeu ainda mais, e também se enroscou em volta do pescoço de Natsuhi.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，這條蛇就這麼勒著藏臼，再度延伸，卷住了夏妃的脖子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，这条蛇就这么勒着藏臼，再度延伸，卷住了夏妃的脖子。

Umineko Project (UP): Without even the chance to scream, their eyes bulged as they went into convulsions and then collapsed.
Steam (ST): Without even a chance to scream, their eyes bulged as they went into convulsions and then collapsed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Without even the chance to scream, their eyes bulged as they went into convulsions and then collapsed.
PC Japanese (JP): 二人は悲鳴すらあげられず、白目を剥いて痙攣し、がくりと脱力する。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sem sequer uma oportunidade para gritar, seus olhos incharam como se estivesse tendo uma convulsão e então sucumbiram.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 两人连惨叫都没喊出口，翻白眼抽搐了一下后，身子就无力地倒下了。

Steam (ST): The gold snake began to drag Krauss and Natsuhi's bodies back.

Steam (ST): ...They slipped through the door to the corridor, dragging the bodies, gradually increasing in speed,
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......They slipped through the door to the corridor, dragging the bodies, gradually increasing in speed,

Russian (RU): ......Он вылетел через дверь в коридор, волоча за собой тела и постепенно увеличивая скорость,

Chinese Simplified (CN): ……钻出通往走廊的门，拖着尸体，渐渐加快速度，

Steam (ST): and rapidly pulled them outside the guesthouse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): and rapidly pulled them outside the guesthouse.
PC Japanese (JP): あっという間にゲストハウスの外へ引っ張り出していく。
Russian (RU): и тут же вытащил их наружу из домика для гостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em um piscar de olhos, ela havia os tirado para fora da casa de hóspedes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 轉眼間就把兩人拖到了賓館外。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 转眼间就把两人拖到了宾馆外。

Umineko Project (UP): So the lobby was still, as though nothing had happened at all.
Steam (ST): So, the lobby was silent, as though nothing had happened.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So the lobby was still, as though nothing had happened.
PC Japanese (JP): だからロビーは、まるで何事もなかったかのように静寂だった。
Russian (RU): В фойе всё было по‐прежнему, словно ничего и не произошло.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O lobby permaneceu como estava, como se nada tivesse acontecido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，大廳內靜寂得就像什麼都沒發生過一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，大厅内静寂得就像什么都没发生过一样。

Umineko Project (UP): ...As though Krauss and Natsuhi had never been there to begin with.
Steam (ST): ...As though Krauss and Natsuhi had not been there since the beginning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...As though Krauss and Natsuhi had not been there since the beginning.
PC Japanese (JP): …初めから蔵臼も夏妃もいなかったかのよう。
Russian (RU): ...Как будто Краусса и Нацухи изначально не было в этом месте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Como se Krauss e Natsuhi nunca tivessem estado ali.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …宛如房中本就沒有夏妃、藏臼兩個人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …宛如房中本就没有夏妃、藏臼两个人。

Umineko Project (UP): Only the sound of the wind and the rain remained, as though feigning ignorance and pretending that they had been the only ones there......
Steam (ST): Only the sound of the wind and the rain remained, as if they were playing dumb and pretending to be the only ones there...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Only the sound of the wind and the rain remained, as though feigning ignorance and pretending that they were the only ones there......
PC Japanese (JP): 雨と風の音だけが、ここには自分たちだけしかいなかったと、素知らぬ顔をして居座っていた……。
Russian (RU): Остался лишь шум дождя и ветра, словно прикидывающихся незнающими и притворяющимися, будто были единственными, кто находился здесь...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Restou apenas o som do vento e da chuva, como se estivessem forjando a ignorância e fingindo que eram os únicos presentes......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 僅剩風雨假惺惺地擺出了副“這兒就我倆”的面孔，死賴著不走……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 仅剩风雨假惺惺地摆出了副“这儿就我俩”的面孔，死赖着不走……。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "......Sorry, I'm fine now. ...Now, I'll go make some coffee."
Steam (ST): "...Sorry, I'm fine now. ...I'll go make some coffee."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……ごめんなさい、もう大丈夫よ。…今、コーヒーを淹れるわね」

Umineko Project (UP): Even though they had been in that sofa until the very moment she had choked and gone to the lavatory, they had now gone, as if they had been an illusion from the beginning.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though they had supposedly been in that sofa until the moment she had choked and gone to the lavatory, they had gone, as if they had been an illusion from the beginning.
PC Japanese (JP): 咽込んで化粧室に行ったその瞬間まで、彼らはそこのソファーにいたはずなのに、まるでそれが幻であったかのようにいなくなっていた。
Russian (RU): И хотя они сидели на том самом диване в момент, когда она подавилась и пошла в туалет, они исчезли, словно с самого начала были лишь иллюзией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo eles tendo estado no sofá até o instante em que ela sufocou e se dirigiu ao lavabo, eles agora haviam sumido, como se não fossem mais do que uma ilusão desde o princípio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 直到自己因被嗆著而去了化妝室的那一瞬間，他們都是坐在那張沙發上的，可此刻卻不見了踪影，就如同那是一場幻覺一般。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 直到自己因被呛着而去了化妆室的那一瞬间，他们都是坐在那张沙发上的，可此刻却不见了踪影，就如同那是一场幻觉一般。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "...How careless... ......Where did those two go off together?"
Steam (ST): "...How careless of them... ...Where did those two go off to together?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...How careless.........Where did those two go off together?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…無用心ね…。……二人揃ってどこに行っちゃったの？」
Russian (RU): "...Какая неосторожность... ......Куда эти двое ушли?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Quanto descuido... ......Aonde aqueles dois foram?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…真不小心…。……兩人一起去了哪兒呢？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…真不小心…。……两人一起去了哪儿呢？」

Umineko Project (UP): Like she was pretending to be in a detective novel, Eva put her hand on the sofa.
Steam (ST): Eva put her hand on the sofa as though acting out a scene from a detective novel.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 探偵小説の真似事っぽく、絵羽はソファーに手を当てる。
Russian (RU): Словно сыщик из детективного романа, Ева положила руку на диван.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como se simulasse estar em um livro de detetive, Eva aproximou sua cabeça do sofá.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就像是學偵探小說的樣似的，繪羽把手貼到了沙發上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就像是学侦探小说的样似的，绘羽把手贴到了沙发上。

Umineko Project (UP): ......She felt a warmth indicating that they had been sitting there until a short while ago.
Steam (ST): ...She felt a warmth that meant that they'd been sitting there until a short while ago.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......She felt a warmth which meant that they had been sitting there until a short while ago.
PC Japanese (JP): ……ついさっきまで彼らが座っていたことを示す温もりが感じられた。
Russian (RU): ......Она ощутила тепло, означающее, что они сидели здесь совсем недавно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ela sentiu um calor que indicava que eles estavam sentados ali até um momento atrás.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……手上感受到了，表明著他們不久前還在此處坐著的餘溫。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……手上感受到了，表明着他们不久前还在此处坐着的余温。

Umineko Project (UP): Maybe they had gone to do the rounds or something.
Steam (ST): Maybe they went to do the rounds or something.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe they had gone to do the rounds or something.
PC Japanese (JP): 見回りにでも行っているのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Может быть, они пошли делать обход или что‐то в это роде.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez tenham ido fazer a ronda ou algo assim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 也許是去巡視了吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 也许是去巡视了吧。

Umineko Project (UP): For the time being, Eva sat down and waited for their return...
Steam (ST): For the time being, Eva sat down and waited for their return...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For the time being, Eva sat down and waited for their return...
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽はとりあえず腰を下ろし、彼らの戻りを待つのだった…。
Russian (RU): Тогда Ева решила покамест присесть и подождать их возвращения...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Daquele momento em diante, Eva sentou‐se no sofá e esperou pelo retorno deles...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽姑且是選擇坐了下來，等待他們歸來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽姑且是选择坐了下来，等待他们归来…。

Umineko Project (UP): Beato and George could be seen in the parlor of the mansion.{n}George was kneeling near Shannon's body as though praying...{n}His face was sincerity itself, and there was even sweat on his forehead.
Steam (ST): Beato and George could be seen in the parlor of the mansion. George was kneeling near Shannon's body as though praying... His face was serious, and there was even sweat on his forehead.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beato and George could be seen in the parlor of the mansion. George was kneeling near Shannon's body as though praying... His face was serious, and there was even sweat on his forehead.
PC Japanese (JP): 屋敷の客室には、ベアトと譲治の姿があった。譲治は紗音の遺体の脇に、祈るように跪いている…。その表情は真剣そのもので、額には汗さえ浮いていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 屋敷の客間には、ベアトと譲治の姿があった。{n}譲治は紗音の遺体の脇に、祈るように跪いている…。{n}その表情は真剣そのもので、額には汗さえ浮いていた。
Russian (RU): Беато и Джордж в это время находились в гостиной особняка.{n}Джордж стоял на коленях возле тела Шаннон, словно молясь...{n}У него было предельно серьёзное лицо, а на лбу даже выступили капли пота.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beato e George podiam ser visto na sala de visitas da mansão.{n}George estava ajoelhado próximo do corpo de Shannon, como se estivesse rezando... Seu rosto demonstrava a mais pura sinceridade, com gotas de suor em sua testa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵與讓治身處大屋客廳。{n}讓治如在祈禱般地，跪在了紗音的遺體身邊…。{n}他的表情十分認真，額頭上甚至浮起了汗珠。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵与让治身处大屋客厅。{n}让治如在祈祷般地，跪在了纱音的遗体身边…。{n}他的表情十分认真，额头上甚至浮起了汗珠。

Umineko Project (UP): However, Beato was the same. Now that she had handed her name over, most of her previous power had been lost.
Steam (ST): However, Beato was the same. Now that she had handed her name over, most of her previous power had been lost.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, Beato was the same. Now that she had handed her name over, most of her previous power had been lost.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、それはベアトも同じだった。自らの名を譲り渡した彼女には、かつての魔力のほとんどが失われている。
Russian (RU): Однако Беато тоже была здесь. После того, как она передала своё имя, большая часть её прежней магической силы была утрачена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, Beato permanecia a mesma. Agora que ela havia passado seu nome, a maior parte do poder que ela detinha havia se perdido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而貝阿朵的神情也與他完全一樣。讓出了自身名號的她，幾乎失去了所有以往的魔力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而贝阿朵的神情也与他完全一样。让出了自身名号的她，几乎失去了所有以往的魔力。

Umineko Project (UP): ...Of course, she still had more than enough power to be called a witch, but compared to the past, it was a very faint thing.
Steam (ST): ...Of course, she still had more than enough power to be called a witch, but compared to the past, it was a very faint thing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …もちろん、それでも充分に魔女と呼べる魔力はあるが、かつてを思えば、あまりにささやかなものだ。
Russian (RU): ...Разумеется, пока ещё у неё оставалось достаточно силы, чтобы называться ведьмой, но в сравнении с прошлым, эта была достаточно скромной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...É claro, ela ainda possuía poder mais do que suficiente para ser considerada uma bruxa, mas comparado ao passado, era algo muito fraco.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …當然，儘管如此，她還是具有著足以被稱為魔女的魔力，不過相比以前，這就實在太過於微薄了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …当然，尽管如此，她还是具有着足以被称为魔女的魔力，不过相比以前，这就实在太过于微薄了。

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "......Good. Don't talk to her, don't touch her with your hand. ...Call to her with the voice of your heart; seek her with the hand of your heart. ...Only your strong feelings can make my magic reach Shannon's lost soul."
Steam (ST): "...Good. Don't talk to her, don't touch her with your hand. ...Call to her with the voice of your heart, and seek her with the hand of your heart. ...Only your strong feelings can make my magic reach Shannon's lost soul."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Fine. Don't talk to her, don't touch her with your hand. ...Call to her with the voice of your heart, and seek her with the hand of your heart. ...Only your strong feelings can make my magic reach Shannon's lost soul."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……いいぞ。声を掛けるな、手で触れるな。…心の声で呼べよ、心の手で求めよ。…そなたの強き想いだけが、紗音の失われた魂に妾の魔法を届かせる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……いいぞ。声を掛けるな、手で触れるな。…心の声で呼べよ、心の手で求めよ。…そなたの強き想いだけが、紗音の失われた魂に妾の魔法を届かせる」
Russian (RU): "......Именно так. Не разговаривай с ней, не касайся её руками. ...Призывай её голосом своего сердца и ищи рукой своего сердца. ...Лишь твои сильные чувства могут позволить моей магии вернуть утерянную душу Шаннон."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Muito bem. Não fale com ela, não a toque com suas mãos. ...Chame‐a com a voz do seu coração, busque por ela com a mão do seu coração. ...Apenas os seus fortes sentimentos podem fazer minha magia chegar até a alma perdida da Shannon."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……很好。勿以聲喊，勿以手觸。…用心之聲呼喚，用心之手探求。…只有汝的強烈思念，才能將妾身的魔法傳遞給紗音失去的靈魂。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……很好。勿以声喊，勿以手触。…用心之声呼唤，用心之手探求。…只有汝的强烈思念，才能将妾身的魔法传递给纱音失去的灵魂。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): George maintained a single‐minded focus.{n}He kept frantically yelling inside his heart, trying to call back the soul of the person he loved.
Steam (ST): George kept praying earnestly and silently. He kept frantically yelling inside his heart, trying to call back the soul of the person he loved.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George kept praying earnestly and silently. He kept frantically yelling inside his heart, trying to call back the soul of the person he loved.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治はひたすらに念じ続ける。愛しき人の魂を呼び戻そうと、心の中で必死に叫び続ける。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 譲治はひたすらに念じ続ける。{n}愛しき人の魂を呼び戻そうと、心の中で必死に叫び続ける。
Russian (RU): Джордж продолжал молиться искренне и молча.{n}Он продолжал неистово кричать в своём сердце, пытаясь дозваться до души человека, которого любил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): George manteve sua mente focada apenas naquilo.{n}Ele continua a gritar freneticamente dentro de seu coração a fim de chamar de volta a alma da pessoa que ele amava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治一個勁兒地祈禱著。{n}為了喚回深愛之人的靈魂，在心中不停地拚命呼喊著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治一个劲儿地祈祷着。{n}为了唤回深爱之人的灵魂，在心中不停地拼命呼喊着。

Umineko Project (UP): ...He strongly envisioned his soul leaving his body, and searching for her as she wandered through Hell.
Steam (ST): ...He strongly envisioned his soul leaving his body...and searching for her as she wandered through the Land of the Dead.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...He strongly envisioned his soul leaving his body, and searching for her as she wandered through hell.
PC Japanese (JP): …自らの肉体より魂だけが抜け出して、冥府に迷い込んだ彼女を探すところを強くイメージした。
Russian (RU): ...Он чётко представил, как его душа оставила своё тело и искала её, блуждая в адском мире.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Ele fortemente visionou sua alma deixando seu corpo, e procurando por ela como se vagasse pelo Inferno.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …靈魂脫出自身的肉體，以精神強烈地描繪出了，探尋在冥府中彷徨著的她的情景。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …灵魂脱出自身的肉体，以精神强烈地描绘出了，探寻在冥府中彷徨着的她的情景。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Beato turned that strong force into magical power, supplementing her own magic. It was magic that, in the past, she could have performed easily, without anyone's help.
Steam (ST): ...Beato turned that strong force into magical power that supplemented her own magic. This was magic that, in the past, she could have performed easily, without anyone's help.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……その強い力を、ベアトは魔力に変換し、自らの魔法に加える。かつては誰の助けも借りずに、片手間で出来た魔法だ。
Russian (RU): ......Беато, в свою очередь, обращала эту силу в магию, дополняя её своей магической силой. Это была та магия, которую она в прошлом, с лёгкостью могла использовать без посторонней помощи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Beato converteu aquela força em poder mágico, suplementando sua própria magia. Era a magia que, no passado, ela podia dar forma facilmente, sem a ajuda de ninguém.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……貝阿朵將這份強勁的力量變換為魔力，加於自己的魔法上。這是她以前不用借助任何人幫忙，就能隨隨便便完成的魔法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……贝阿朵将这份强劲的力量变换为魔力，加于自己的魔法上。这是她以前不用借助任何人帮忙，就能随随便便完成的魔法。

Umineko Project (UP): ...But now, if she didn't rely on someone's help, she wouldn't be able to finish the chant, much less succeed.
Steam (ST): ...But now, if she didn't rely on someone's assistance, she wouldn't be able to finish the chant, much less succeed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …しかし今は、助けを借りなければ、成功は愚か、詠唱を終えるには至らない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …しかし今は、助けを借りなければ、成功はおろか、詠唱を終えるには至らない。
Russian (RU): ...Но теперь, если она не положится на чью‐либо помощь, она не сможет закончить это дело, не говоря уже о его успехе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas agora, se ela não dependesse da ajuda de alguém, não seria capaz de terminar o encantamento, muito menos obter sucesso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不過，在現今，若是不借助他人的幫助，別提成功了，就連咒語都沒法唱完。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不过，在现今，若是不借助他人的帮助，别提成功了，就连咒语都没法唱完。

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): ".........I have forgotten after several hundred years... .........Was magic, ......was resurrection...always this difficult of a magic......?"
Steam (ST): "......I'd forgotten for several centuries... ......Was magic... was resurrection... always this difficult...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........I have forgotten after several hundred years............Was magic, ......was resurrection, ...always this difficult of a magic......?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………数百年近くも忘れておったわ…。………魔法とは、……反魂とは、…こんなにも辛い魔法であったか……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………数百年近くも忘れておったわ…。………魔法とは、……反魂とは、…こんなにも辛い魔法であったか……」
Russian (RU): ".........Несколько сотен лет спустя я позабыла... но неужели магия... неужели воскрешение... было столь сложной магией?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Após diversas centenas de anos eu acabei esquecendo... .........Era a magia, ......a ressurreição...sempre essa forma de magia tão difícil......?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………忘了將近數百年呢…。………魔法，……返魂，…竟是此等辛苦的魔法嗎……？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………忘了将近数百年呢…。………魔法，……返魂，…竟是此等辛苦的魔法吗……？」

Umineko Project (UP): An even more strained expression than George's had risen to Beato's face.
Steam (ST): Beato was wearing an even more strained expression than George.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): An even more strained expression rose to Beato's face than George's.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトは、譲治以上に辛い表情を浮かべている。
Russian (RU): Лицо Беато было напряжено даже сильнее, чем у Джорджа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com uma expressão ainda mais exaurida daquela que George havia direcionado para beato.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵的臉上，浮現出了比讓治更辛苦的表情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵的脸上，浮现出了比让治更辛苦的表情。

Umineko Project (UP): ...She was still forgetting this, but the magic to revive a life is fundamentally the ultimate hidden art.
Steam (ST): ...It had slipped her mind, but originally, the magic to revive a life was the ultimate hidden art.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...It had slipped her mind, but originally, the magic to revive a life was the ultimate hidden art.
PC Japanese (JP): …彼女はまだ失念しているが、本来、命を蘇らせる魔法は究極の秘術だ。
Russian (RU): ...Она уже успела позабыть, но изначально магия возрождения являлась одним из самых тайных искусств.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Ela ainda estava esquecendo sobre isso, mas a magia para reviver uma vida é fundamentalmente a mais poderosa das artes ocultas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖然她還沒有記起來，但復甦生命的魔法本就是究極的秘術。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽然她还没有记起来，但复苏生命的魔法本就是究极的秘术。

Umineko Project (UP): It was her previous magical power, giving her the ability to use that magic over and over with a snap of her fingers, that was abnormal.
Steam (ST): The abnormal thing was her previous magical power, which could be used over and over with a snap of her fingers.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was her previous magical power that could be used over and over with a snap of her fingers that was abnormal.
PC Japanese (JP): それを指を鳴らすだけで何度でも扱えたかつての魔力の方が逸脱しているのだ。
Russian (RU): Это её прошлая магическая сила, которую можно было использовать снова и снова одним щелчком пальцев, была невероятной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era seu antigo poder mágico que dava a ela a habilidade de usar essa magia incontáveis vezes com o estalar de dedos, que era algo anormal.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 以前她那只需打個響指，就能無數次實現這魔法的魔力，才超越了常理。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 以前她那只需打个响指，就能无数次实现这魔法的魔力，才超越了常理。

Umineko Project (UP): Therefore, the heavy burden to her body and mind was, by rights, absolutely to be expected...
Steam (ST): So, the heavy burden on her body and mind was, fundamentally speaking, extremely natural...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Therefore, the heavy burden to her body and mind was, fundamentally, extremely fitting...
PC Japanese (JP): だから、彼女が感じる肉体と精神への強い負担は、本来、極めて正当なもの…。
Russian (RU): Таким образом, изматывающее напряжение, накатившее на её тело и разум, по сути, были естественной платой...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Consequentemente, o pesado fardo que isso trazia ao seu corpo e a sua mente, era algo esperado...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，她感受到的肉體與精神上的強烈負擔，本就是極其正常的現象…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，她感受到的肉体与精神上的强烈负担，本就是极其正常的现象…。

Steam (ST): "...However, ......this man's power... ...Even though he doesn't know magic, it's nothing to be laughed at. ...I see, so he truly is Kinzo's grandchild..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......However, .........this person's power, ...even though he doesn't know magic, it's nothing to be laughed at. ......I see, so he truly is Kinzo's grandchild..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……しかし、………こやつめの力、…魔法を知らぬと言うのに、かなりのもの。……なるほど、さすがは金蔵の孫といったところか…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……しかし、………こやつめの力、…魔法を知らぬと言うのに、かなりのもの。……なるほど、さすがは金蔵の孫といったところか…」
Russian (RU): "......Однако... Сила этого человека, даже если ему недоступна магия, всё равно внушительна. ......Теперь я вижу, вот что значит настоящий внук Кинзо..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Porém, .........o poder que possui agora...é considerável, mesmo ele não conhecendo a magia. ......Entendo, você é realmente neto do Kinzo..."
