Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Did you come to sneer at how pathetic I am? ......And after all this time, ...if I have my head patted by a retired witch, the other witches will laugh at me......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……無様な妾を、わざわざ嘲笑いに来たかよ。……それに、隠居までした魔女が、…今更頭なんか撫でられちゃ、他の魔女の笑い者だぜ……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……無様な妾を、わざわざ嘲笑いに来たかよ。……それに、隠居までした魔女が、…今更頭なんか撫でられちゃ、他の魔女の笑い者だぜ……」
Russian (RU): "......Вы пришли посмеяться над тем, какое жалкое зрелище я собой являю? ......И после всего времени, что прошло... Если меня по голове погладит ведьма в отставке, другие ведьмы меня просто засмеют..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Você veio aqui apenas para zombar de como eu sou patética? ......E depois de todo esse tempo, após deixar de ser uma bruxa, ...se eu sentar aqui e ter minha cabeça acariciada, me tornarei motivo de risos de outras bruxas......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是專程來嘲笑，不像樣的妾身的嗎？……再說了，要是現在還被早已隱居的魔女摸頭，…我會成為其他魔女的笑柄的啊……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是专程来嘲笑，不像样的妾身的吗？……再说了，要是现在还被早已隐居的魔女摸头，…我会成为其他魔女的笑柄的啊……」

Speaker: {f:5:Virgilia}
Umineko Project (UP): "That's right. ......Not only are you a full adult, but you boast about having retired from active service, so I am sure that it would be far too embarrassing to tell anyone that you only just now learned how to use magic."
Steam (ST): "That's right. ...According to your bragging, you were not only a full adult, but a retired one, and yet only now have you learned how to use magic. That certainly does sound too embarrassing to tell anyone."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's right. ......Not only are you not a full adult, but you boast about avoiding your duty, and the fact that you only learned how to use magic now is so embarrassing that you can't tell anybody."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうですね。……一人前どころか、現役を退いたと豪語するあなたなのに、今頃になって魔法の使い方を覚えたなど、恥ずかしくて誰にも言えませんね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうですね。……一人前どころか、現役を退いたと豪語するあなたなのに、今頃になって魔法の使い方を覚えたなど、恥ずかしくて誰にも言えませんね」
Russian (RU): "Верно. ......Ты не только не являешься полноценной взрослой женщиной, но и хвастаешься манкированием своих обязанностей, а тот факт, что ты только сейчас научилась пользоваться магией, настолько постыден, что тебе не хочется никому рассказывать об этом."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso mesmo. ......Além de ser uma adulta, você se vangloriou de ser ter se retirado de suas atividades, por isso tenho certeza que seria muito embaraçoso dizer a qualquer um que você só aprendeu a usar magia agora."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是呢。……豈止是獨當一面，甚至還豪言壯語過要讓位的你，倒是會羞得沒法將“直到現在才懂得了魔法的使用方法”這件事告訴任何人呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是呢。……岂止是独当一面，甚至还豪言壮语过要让位的你，倒是会羞得没法将“直到现在才懂得了魔法的使用方法”这件事告诉任何人呢。」

PC Japanese (JP): 「４１０データ受領。すっトロいにぇ、先代さまぁッ！！来た来た来たぁ、…着弾ッ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「４１０データ受領。すっトロいにぇ、先代さまぁッ！！　来た来た来たぁ、…着弾ッ！！」
Russian (RU): "410, данные получены. Вы слишком мед‐ли‐тель‐ны, госпожа Предшественница!!! Летит, летит, летит... Удар!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "410, dados recebidos. Muuuito lenta, nyeh, predecessora!! Está vindo está, vindo está vindo, ...IMPACTO!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「410 收到数据。好蠢捏，先代夫人——！！来了来了来了啊，…中弹！！」

Umineko Project (UP): The Chiester Sisters' golden bow would not let its kill escape.{n}It would not let them block it.
Steam (ST): Prey targeted by the Chiester Sisters' golden bow did not escape. It could not be blocked.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Prey that the Siesta Sisters' golden bow aimed at did not escape. It could not be blocked.
PC Japanese (JP): シエスタ姉妹の黄金弓は、狙った獲物を逃さない。防がせない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): シエスタ姉妹の黄金弓は、狙った獲物を逃さない。{n}防がせない。
Russian (RU): Добыча, в которую целился золотой лук сестёр Чиест, не стала бежать.{n}Его нельзя было отразить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O arco dourado das Irmãs Chiester não iria deixar sua presa escapar.{n}Não iria permitir ser bloqueado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被謝絲塔姐妹的黃金弓所盯上的獵物。{n}逃不掉、防不住。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被谢丝塔姐妹的黄金弓所盯上的猎物。{n}逃不掉、防不住。

Umineko Project (UP): ...No magical barrier could even dream of blocking it without being multilayered.
Steam (ST): ...No magical barrier could even dream of blocking it without being multilayered.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …魔法的なあらゆる障壁も、多層でなければ防ぐことを夢見ることさえ許さない。
Russian (RU): ...Ни один магический барьер и помыслить не мог отразить его выстрелы, не будучи многослойным.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Nenhuma barreira mágica seria capaz de sonhar bloquear aquela ataque sem ao menos possuir multicamadas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …就連魔法上的一切屏障也是，只要不是布下了多層，就休想防住。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …就连魔法上的一切屏障也是，只要不是布下了多层，就休想防住。

Umineko Project (UP): The weak point during the instant of confusion caused by {f:5:Virgilia}'s deception magic was Beato's only chance to escape.
Steam (ST): The gap opened during that instant of confusion caused by {f:5:Virgilia}'s deception magic was Beato's only chance to escape.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The weak point during the instant of confusion caused by Virgilia's deception magic was Beato's only chance to escape.
PC Japanese (JP): ワルギリアが放った欺瞞魔法により、一瞬だけ混乱したその隙だけが、ベアトが逃げ去るチャンス。
Russian (RU): Кратковременная путаница, вызванная отвлекающей магией {f:5:Вергилии}, стала единственным шансом Беато на спасение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O ponto fraco durante a confusão causada pela magia de enganação de {f:5:Virgilia} era a única chance de Beato escapar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 瓦爾基莉亞施放的欺瞞魔法所造成的一瞬間的混亂，是貝阿朵逃跑的唯一機會。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 瓦尔基莉亚施放的欺瞒魔法所造成的一瞬间的混乱，是贝阿朵逃跑的唯一机会。

Umineko Project (UP): And the only opportunity to make the sisters confuse {f:5:Virgilia} for Beato.
Steam (ST): And, it was the only chance to make the sisters confuse {f:5:Virgilia} for Beato.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And, it was the only chance to make the sisters confuse Virgilia for Beato.

Russian (RU): И кроме того, то был единственны шанс обмануть сестёр Чиест, заставив их принять {f:5:Вергилию} за Беато.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E a única oportunidade de fazer as irmãs confundirem {f:5:Virgilia} e Beato.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且，也是讓姐妹倆誤把瓦爾基莉亞當成貝阿朵的唯一機會。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并且，也是让姐妹俩误把瓦尔基莉亚当成贝阿朵的唯一机会。

Umineko Project (UP): As {f:5:Virgilia} spread her arms wide, blocking the way to her beloved disciple, the gold snake pierced straight through the location of her heart...
Steam (ST): As {f:5:Virgilia} spread her arms wide, blocking the way to her beloved disciple, the gold snake pierced straight through her heart...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Virgilia spread her arms wide, blocking the way to her beloved disciple, the gold snake pierced straight through her heart...
PC Japanese (JP): 両手を広げて愛弟子を庇うワルギリアの心臓の位置を正確に、黄金の蛇が打ち抜く…。
Russian (RU): Когда {f:5:Вергилия} раскинула руки в стороны, преграждая путь к своей любимой ученице, золотой змей пронзил её прямо в сердце...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {f:5:Virgilia} abriu seus braços, bloqueando o caminho até sua amada discípula, e a cobra dourada perfurou diretamente através de seu coração...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金蛇精確地射穿了，張開雙臂保護愛徒的瓦爾基莉亞的心臟…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金蛇精确地射穿了，张开双臂保护爱徒的瓦尔基莉亚的心脏…。

Umineko Project (UP): The snake, which had snuck in through the keyhole, shot through George and Shannon, and then shot through {f:5:Virgilia} in an instant, completely failed to notice as Beato escaped...
Steam (ST): After sneaking in through the keyhole, the snake shot through George, Shannon, and then {f:5:Virgilia} in an instant, completely failing to notice Beato as she used that instant to escape...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The snake, which had snuck in through the keyhole, had shot through George and Shannon, and had then shot through Virgilia in an instant, completely failed to notice as Beato escaped...
PC Japanese (JP): 鍵穴より侵入し、譲治と紗音の二人を撃ち抜き、さらにワルギリアまでも撃ち抜いた黄金の蛇は、その瞬間に逃げ去ったベアトについては完全に気付けなかった…。
Russian (RU): Змей, который пробрался через замочную скважину, прострелил навылет Джорджа с Шаннон, а затем в один миг прострелил {f:5:Вергилию}, совершенно не заметив, как скрылась Беато...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A cobra, que havia entrado pela fechadura, disparado contra George e Shannon, e então contra {f:5:Virgilia} em um único instante, falhou miseravelmente em perceber a fuga de Beato...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從鑰匙孔侵入，射穿讓治與紗音，然後再射穿瓦爾基莉亞的黃金蛇，完全沒有注意到，在那一瞬間逃掉了的貝阿朵…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从钥匙孔侵入，射穿让治与纱音，然后再射穿瓦尔基莉亚的黄金蛇，完全没有注意到，在那一瞬间逃掉了的贝阿朵…。

Umineko Project (UP): As soon as {f:5:Virgilia} saw that Beato had gotten away, she expired.
Steam (ST): As soon as {f:5:Virgilia} saw that Beato had gotten away, she died.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As soon as Virgilia saw that Beato had gotten away, she expired.
PC Japanese (JP): ワルギリアは、ベアトが逃げ切れたことを見届けると、事切れる。
Russian (RU): Как только {f:5:Вергилия} убедилась, что Беато скрылась, она скончалась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim que {f:5:Virgilia} viu que Beato havia escapado, ela sucumbiu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 瓦爾基莉亞看到貝阿朵已逃過一劫後，沒了牽掛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 瓦尔基莉亚看到贝阿朵已逃过一劫后，没了牵挂。

Umineko Project (UP): ......The strength left her body, and like gold dust drifting with the wind, her form was erased...
Steam (ST): ...The strength left her body, and like gold dust drifting with the wind, her form was erased...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……がくりと脱力し、その姿をさらさらと風に飛ぶ砂金のようにして、姿を消していった…。
Russian (RU): ......Силы покинули её тело, и подобно золотой пыли на ветру, её форма стёрлась...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Sua força deixou seu corpo, e como um pó dourado à deriva do vento, ela foi apagada...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……身軀無力地倒下，其身姿如隨風飛舞的砂金般，消失了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……身躯无力地倒下，其身姿如随风飞舞的砂金般，消失了…。

Umineko Project (UP): Beato completely erased all traces of her magical power, became gold butterflies, and passed through the wall, escaping to the wind and rain outside......
Steam (ST): Beato completely erased all traces of her magical power, became gold butterflies, and passed through the wall, escaping to the wind and rain outside...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beato completely erased all traces of her magical power, became gold butterflies, and passed through the wall, escaping to the wind and rain outside......
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトは魔力の痕跡を完全に消し去り、黄金の蝶になって、壁をすり抜けて風雨の戸外へ逃げ去る……。
Russian (RU): Беато полностью замела за собой все магические следы, обернулась золотой бабочкой и пролетела сквозь стену, сбежав к ветру и дождю снаружи...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beato ocultou completamente todos os traços de seu poder mágico, transformando‐se em douradas borboletas, passando pelo corredor e escapando em direção ao vento e a chuva do lado de fora......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵完全隱去了魔力，變成了一只黃金蝶，穿過牆壁，逃往風雨交加的戶外……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵完全隐去了魔力，变成了一只黄金蝶，穿过墙壁，逃往风雨交加的户外……。

Steam (ST): ".........Damn it, ......damn it, damn it... ...You bitch, ...you biiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiitch...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...............Damn it, .........damn it, damn it.........You bitch, ......you biiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiitch...!!"

Umineko Project (UP): Beato felt sick from the bottom of her heart.
Steam (ST): Beato felt regret from the bottom of her heart.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beato felt regret from the bottom of her heart.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトは心の底から悔しがる。
Russian (RU): Беато была опечалена до глубины души.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beato sentiu a frustração no fundo de seu coração.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵從心底裏感到懊惱。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵从心底里感到懊恼。

Umineko Project (UP): Why? Because she had been attacked by the new witch?
Steam (ST): Why? Because she had been attacked by the new witch?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Why? Because she had been attacked by the new witch?
PC Japanese (JP): 何に？新しき魔女に襲われたから？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 何に？　新しき魔女に襲われたから？
Russian (RU): Почему? Из‐за нападения на неё новой ведьмы?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por quê? Por que ela foi atacada pela nova bruxa?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為何懊惱？因為遭到了新魔女的攻擊？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为何懊恼？因为遭到了新魔女的攻击？

Umineko Project (UP): Probably...not. Of course, she also felt sick over the loss of her master.
Steam (ST): Probably not. Of course, she hated losing her teacher.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Probably not. Of course losing her teacher was also regrettable.
PC Japanese (JP): 多分、違う。師匠を失ったことももちろん悔しい。
Russian (RU): Пожалуй, нет. Разумеется, потеря её наставницы тоже печалила её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Provavelmente...não. É claro, ela também estava frustrada pela perda de sua professora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 多半不對。當然也有在為失去師傅懊悔。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 多半不对。当然也有在为失去师傅懊悔。

Umineko Project (UP): But even more than that, Beato was enraged at the barbarism which had boorishly stolen the union between the two reunited lovers.
Steam (ST): And even more importantly, Beato was enraged at the barbarism that had boorishly stolen away the reunion between two lovers.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And even more, Beato was enraged at the barbarism which had boorishly stolen the union between the two reunited lovers.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれ以上に、再会できた愛し合う二人の逢瀬を無粋に奪った蛮行に、ベアトは憤った。
Russian (RU): И даже больше, Беато была разгневана тем варварством, которое самым невежественным и грубейшим образом уничтожило союз между двумя воссоединившимися влюблёнными.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas muito mais do que isso, Beato estava enfurecida com a barbárie que havia tomado a união entre os dois amantes reunidos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但比起這個，貝阿朵更是對這不解風情地剝奪了相愛兩人重逢相會的蠻行，感到了憤慨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但比起这个，贝阿朵更是对这不解风情地剥夺了相爱两人重逢相会的蛮行，感到了愤慨。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Beato had poured out almost all of her magical power to reunite them.
Steam (ST): ...Beato had poured out almost all of her magical power to reunite them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……二人を再会させるために、ベアトは魔力のほとんどを注ぎ込んだ。
Russian (RU): ......Беато израсходовала почти все свои магические силы ради их воссоединения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Beato havia gasto quase todo seu poder mágico para reuni‐los.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……為了讓兩人重逢，貝阿朵幾乎傾注了所有的魔力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……为了让两人重逢，贝阿朵几乎倾注了所有的魔力。

Umineko Project (UP): ...That miracle had been achieved only as a result of all that, ......yet it had taken such a short time to steal it away...!
Steam (ST): ...Even though the result had been a miracle, ...the time it took to steal that away had been so ridiculously short...!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Even though the result had been a miracle, ......it had been such a short time before that gift had been stolen...!
PC Japanese (JP): …その末に至った奇跡なのに、……それを奪い去る時間はあまりに一瞬…！
Russian (RU): ...И хотя результат оказался чудом... Потребовалось ничтожное количество времени, чтобы пустить результат под откос!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Aquele milagre havia sido alcançado apenas como resultado de tudo, ......e mesmo assim foi tomado em um período tão curto...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …明明是如此辛苦才達成的奇跡，……可將此奪走的時間，卻不過一瞬間…！
Chinese Simplified (CN): …明明是如此辛苦才达成的奇迹，……可将此夺走的时间，却不过一瞬间…！

Umineko Project (UP): Beato trembled at the barbarous cruelty which had ended it so fast.
Steam (ST): Beato trembled at the barbarous cruelty that had brought about such an abrupt end.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beato trembled at the barbarous cruelty which had ended it too fast.
PC Japanese (JP): その呆気ないまでの蛮行の残酷さに、ベアトは打ち震える。
Russian (RU): Беато тряслась, поражённая их варварской жестокостью быстроты, с которой всё завершилось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beato estremeceu diante daquela bárbara crueldade que terminou em um piscar de olhos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想到這份蠻行中乾脆至極的殘酷，貝阿朵不禁顫抖了起來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想到这份蛮行中干脆至极的残酷，贝阿朵不禁颤抖了起来。

Umineko Project (UP): ......And it was also the true form of the acts she herself had committed up until that point...
Steam (ST): ...Besides, ...this was the true form of the acts she herself had committed up until that point...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......And it was also the true form of the actions she had committed up until that point...
PC Japanese (JP): ……そしてそれは、自らが犯してきた行為の正体でもあるのだ…。
Russian (RU): ......И это была та истинная форма поведения, которой она предпочитала придерживаться совсем недавно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......E isso era também a verdadeira forma dos atos que ela mesma havia cometido até aquele momento...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……而且，這也正是自己一直以來所作所為的真實面目…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……而且，这也正是自己一直以来所作所为的真实面目…。

Umineko Project (UP): So just as strongly as Beato hated the new witch, she looked at her previous self with disgust.
Steam (ST): So just as strongly as Beato hated the new witch, she also looked at her previous self with disgust.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So just as strongly as Beato hated the new witch, she looked at her previous self with disgust.
PC Japanese (JP): だからベアトは、新しき魔女を憎むのと同じだけ、かつての自らを嫌悪した。
Russian (RU): Так же сильно, как Беато ненавидела новую ведьму, с таким же отвращением она сейчас смотрела на бывшую себя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quanto mais forte era o ódio de Beato pela nova bruxa, mais ela olhava para sua antiga eu com nojo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，與憎恨新魔女同等程度地，貝阿朵厭惡起了過去的自己。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，与憎恨新魔女同等程度地，贝阿朵厌恶起了过去的自己。

Umineko Project (UP): But now she had to escape...{n}......If she was targeted next, she would probably lose her life.
Steam (ST): But now, she had to escape... ...If she was targeted next, she would probably lose her life.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But now she had to escape.........If she was targeted next, she would probably lose her life.
PC Japanese (JP): だが、今は逃げなければ…。……次に狙われれば命を落とすだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だが、今は逃げなければ…。{n}……次に狙われれば命を落とすだろう。
Russian (RU): Но теперь ей приходилось спасаться бегством...{n}......Если она станет следующей целью, то, несомненно, тут же лишится жизни.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas agora ela precisava escapar...{n}......Se ela se tornasse o próximo alvo, provavelmente perderia sua vida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，現在得先逃跑…。{n}……如果再被盯上，就會喪命吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，现在得先逃跑…。{n}……如果再被盯上，就会丧命吧。

Umineko Project (UP): And it wouldn't even be funny if the chess player, descended like a god, ended up being attacked and killed by the pieces.
Steam (ST): To think that a chess player had descended, thinking they were like a god, ...only to be attacked by the pieces.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It wasn't even funny that the chess player had descended like a god, and had been attacked by the pieces.
PC Japanese (JP): チェスのプレイヤーが、神様気取りで降臨し、駒に討ち取られたなんて、笑い話にもならないのだから。
Russian (RU): И смеха не вызывал даже тот факт, что шахматист сошёл, подобно богу, и подвергся нападению фигур.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E não seria engraçado se um jogador de xadrez descendesse como um deus, e terminasse sendo atacado e morto pelas peças.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟，棋局棋手自以為是神一般地降臨棋盤，反被棋子吃掉，這可一點都不好笑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟，棋局棋手自以为是神一般地降临棋盘，反被棋子吃掉，这可一点都不好笑。

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "45, Impact Confirmed, Target Scattered. ......W, without a doubt, we crushed the Predecessor-sama...!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「45，确认命中，目标四散。……毫、毫无疑问地击破了先代夫人…！」

Umineko Project (UP): There's no way they went hiding somewhere. Of course, the doors and windows had all been rigorously checked, and all were locked from the inside. Not one of them was broken.
Steam (ST): There's no way they went hiding somewhere. Of course, the doors and windows had all been rigorously checked, and all were locked from the inside. Not one of them was broken.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There's no way they went hiding somewhere. Of course, the doors and windows had all been rigorously checked, and all were locked from the inside. Not one of them was broken.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não é possível que eles estejam se escondendo. É claro, todas as portas e janelas foram rigorosamente verificadas, e todas estão trancadas por dentro. Nenhuma delas foi quebrada.

Umineko Project (UP): And that wasn't just the first floor—the second floor was the same. Also, all of the doors and windows were designed in such a way that they couldn't be locked from the outside.

PC Japanese (JP): それは１階だけじゃない、２階も同様だ。また、全ての扉や窓について、その構造上、外からは掛けられない形の鍵を有している。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O George‐aniki tinha saído dizendo que ia buscar mais café, e desceu as escadas uma hora antes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治大哥在一個多小時前留下了一句“去添咖啡”，下了樓，一去不返。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治大哥在一个多小时前留下了一句“去添咖啡”，下了楼，一去不返。

Umineko Project (UP): I'd been under the impression that he was having a good conversation with Auntie Eva and the rest, ......but Auntie Eva, who had been in the lobby the whole time, said that no one had come down.
Steam (ST): We'd assumed that he was having a conversation with Aunt Eva and the rest, ...but Aunt Eva, who had been in the lobby the whole time, said that no one had come down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We had been under the impression that he was having a conversation with Eva oba-san and the rest, ......but Eva oba-san, who had been in the lobby the whole time, said that no one had come down.
PC Japanese (JP): きっと、絵羽伯母さんたちと会話が弾んでいるのだろうと思い込んでいたのだが、……ずっとロビーにいた絵羽伯母さんは、誰も降りてこなかったと話す。
Russian (RU): Мы полагали, что он остался поговорить с тётей Евой и остальными, но тётя Ева, которая находилась в вестибюле всё это время, сказала, что не спускался никто.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu pensei que ele estivesse tendo uma boa conversa com a tia Eva e os outros, ......mas a tia Eva, que estava no lobby o tempo inteiro, disse que ninguém havia descido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然我還以為，大哥一定是在與繪羽姑母他們聊天，……但一直都待在大廳裡的繪羽姑母卻說，沒人下過樓。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然我还以为，大哥一定是在与绘羽姑母他们聊天，……但一直都待在大厅里的绘羽姑母却说，没人下过楼。

Umineko Project (UP): Since all of the doors and windows are locked from the inside, ...it's hard to imagine that they went outside.
Steam (ST): Since all the doors and windows were locked from the inside, ...it was unthinkable that they had gone outside.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since all of the doors and windows were locked from the inside, ...it was unthinkable that they had gone outside.
PC Japanese (JP): 全ての扉と窓が内側から施錠されている以上、…彼らが外へ出て行ったとは考えられない。
Russian (RU): Поскольку все двери и окна были заперты изнутри, их уход наружу казался немыслимым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como todas as portas e janelas estão trancadas por dentro, ...é difícil imaginar que eles tenham indo para fora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 由於所有的門窗都從內側鎖得好好的，…所以他們不可能去了外面。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 由于所有的门窗都从内侧锁得好好的，…所以他们不可能去了外面。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Nevertheless, three humans had evaporated from this barricaded guesthouse, which had become a perfect locked room......
Steam (ST): ...However, three humans had evaporated from this barricaded guesthouse, which had become a perfect closed room...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......However, three humans had evaporated from this barricaded guesthouse, which had become a perfect closed room......
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、この完全な密室と化した篭城のゲストハウスから、人間が３人も蒸発したのだ……。
Russian (RU): ......Однако трое человек испарились из этого забаррикадированного домика для гостей, ставшего идеальной закрытой комнатой......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mesmo assim, três humanos evaporaram da barricada feita na casa de hóspedes, que se transformou em um perfeito quarto fechado......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……然而，在這化為了完全的密室的賓館中，竟憑空蒸發了三個人……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……然而，在这化为了完全的密室的宾馆中，竟凭空蒸发了三个人……。

Umineko Project (UP): It's hard to imagine any reason why they'd hide themselves away for a surprise prank in a situation like this.
Steam (ST): In a situation like this, we couldn't imagine that this was because they were playing hide-and-seek and trying to scare us with a prank.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In a situation like this, we couldn't imagine that this was because they were playing hide-and-seek and trying to scare us with a prank.
PC Japanese (JP): このような状況下で、驚かすなんて悪戯のために、彼らが隠れん坊をする理由など考えられない。
Russian (RU): В подобной ситуации мы не могли представить, что им взбрело в голову поиграть в прятки, стремясь напугать нас этой шалостью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É difícil imaginar qualquer motivo para eles terem se escondidos para nos pregar uma peça em uma situação como essa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這種狀況下，他們也不可能因為想要嚇我們一跳，而躲起了貓貓。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这种状况下，他们也不可能因为想要吓我们一跳，而躲起了猫猫。

Umineko Project (UP): ......It's probably appropriate to think that they've become caught up in this crime...
Steam (ST): ...It was probably reasonable to assume that they'd been caught up in this crime...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......It was probably appropriate to think that they had been caught up in this crime...
PC Japanese (JP): ……事件に巻き込まれたと考えるのが妥当だろう…。
Russian (RU): ......Было вполне впору думать, а не являются ли они причастными к этому преступлению...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Provavelmente é apropriado dizer que eles foram pegos nesse crime...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……按照卷進了事件中來想，會比較妥當吧…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……按照卷进了事件中来想，会比较妥当吧…。

Umineko Project (UP): When Auntie Eva learned that her only son was missing, she went half insane, running from room to room and yelling his name loudly.
Steam (ST): When Aunt Eva had learned that her only son was missing, she had gone half insane, running from room to room and yelling his name.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Eva oba-san had learned that her only son was missing, she had gone half insane, running from room to room and yelling his name loudly.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんは、一人息子が失踪していたことを知り、半狂乱になって、部屋から部屋へ大声でその名を呼びながら駆け回っている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 絵羽伯母さんは、一人息子が失踪していたことを知り、錯乱状態になって、部屋から部屋へ大声でその名を呼びながら駆け回っている。
Russian (RU): Когда тётя Ева узнала, что её единственный сын бесследно исчез, её охватила паника, и она начала перебегать из комнаты в комнату, громко выкрикивая его имя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando a tia Eva descobriu que seu único filho estava desaparecido, ela ficou enlouquecida, correndo de quarto em quarto, gritando o nome dele em voz alta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽姑母在得知了自己的獨子失踪後，陷入了半癲狂狀態，奔進一間間房間，大喊著兒子的名字。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽姑母在得知了自己的独子失踪后，陷入了半癫狂状态，奔进一间间房间，大喊着儿子的名字。

Umineko Project (UP): ...And Jessica, who had suddenly lost both of her parents, followed suit.
Steam (ST): ...And Jessica, who had suddenly lost both of her parents, had chased after her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...And Jessica, who had suddenly lost both of her parents, had chased after her.
PC Japanese (JP): …そして、唐突に両親を失った朱志香も後に続く。
Russian (RU): ...И Джессика, у которой внезапно пропали оба родителя, тоже бросилась за ней следом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E a Jessica, que havia perdido seus pais repentinamente, a acompanhou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …而突然失去雙親的朱志香也緊隨其後。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …而突然失去双亲的朱志香也紧随其后。

Umineko Project (UP): Cries of "George, George" and "Mom, Dad" were even now continuing to echo through the guesthouse...
Steam (ST): Cries of "George, George" and "Mom, Dad" had continued to echo through the guesthouse for some time...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Cries of 'George, George' and 'Mom, Dad' continued to echo through the guesthouse for some time...
PC Japanese (JP): ゲストハウスの中には、譲治譲治という声と、父さん母さんという声が、いつまでも木霊し続けている…。
Russian (RU): Крики "Джордж, Джордж" и "мама, папа" продолжали некоторое время эхом разноситься в домике для гостей...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Gritos de "George, George" e "mãe, pai" agora continuavam a ecoar pela casa de hóspedes...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 喊著“讓治，讓治”的聲音與喊著“爸爸，媽媽”的聲音，一直回蕩在賓館之中…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 喊着“让治，让治”的声音与喊着“爸爸，妈妈”的声音，一直回荡在宾馆之中…。

Umineko Project (UP): I think George said something about wanting to see Shannon's face.
Steam (ST): I think George said something about wanting to see Shannon's dead face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I think George said something about wanting to see Shannon's dead face.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治の兄貴は、紗音ちゃんの死に顔を見たい、というようなことを口にしていたと思う。
Russian (RU): Я припоминаю, что Джордж что‐то говорил о том, как хотел бы увидеть мёртвое лицо Шаннон.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu acho que o George tinha dito algo sobre querer ver o rosto da Shannon.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 記得讓治大哥說過“好想看看紗音遺容”之類的話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 记得让治大哥说过“好想看看纱音遗容”之类的话。

Umineko Project (UP): ......It would be reasonable to imagine that he had snuck out of the guesthouse and gone to the mansion.
Steam (ST): ...It would be reasonable to assume that he snuck out of the guesthouse and went to the mansion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……こっそりとゲストハウスを抜け出して、屋敷へ行ったと考えるのが妥当だった。
Russian (RU): ......Было вполне разумно предположить, что он тайно покинул домик для гостей и отправился в особняк.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......É sensato imaginar que ele tenha escapado da casa de hóspedes e ido até a mansão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……按他悄悄溜出了賓館，去了大屋來想，會比較妥當吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……按他悄悄溜出了宾馆，去了大屋来想，会比较妥当吧。

Umineko Project (UP): ...However, I don't know about Uncle Krauss and Aunt Natsuhi.{n}...Maybe they guessed that's what happened, and went to the mansion to search for him...?
Steam (ST): ...But I didn't have a clue about Uncle Krauss and Aunt Natsuhi. ...Did they see him leave...and then go to the mansion to search for him...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...However, I don't know about Krauss oji-san and Natsuhi oba-san....Did they notice that, and go to the mansion to search for him...?
PC Japanese (JP): …だが、蔵臼伯父さんたちについてはわからない。…それを察して、屋敷へ探しに行ったのだろうか…？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …だが、蔵臼伯父さんたちについてはわからない。{n}…それを察して、屋敷へ探しに行ったのだろうか…？
Russian (RU): ...Впрочем, я затрудняюсь что‐либо сказать насчёт дяди Краусса и тёти Нацухи.{n}...Могли ли они заметить его уход и отправиться следом на его поиски?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Porém, eu não posso dizer isso sobre o tio Krauss e a tia Natsuhi.{n}...Talvez eles tenham suposto o que aconteceu, e então foram até a mansão procurar por ele...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不過，關於藏臼伯父他們，就不知道了。{n}…他們是察覺到了這點，而去大屋找他了嗎…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不过，关于藏臼伯父他们，就不知道了。{n}…他们是察觉到了这点，而去大屋找他了吗…？

Umineko Project (UP): Without even telling Auntie Eva...?
Steam (ST): Without even telling Aunt Eva...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Without even telling Eva oba-san...?
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんに声も掛けずに…？
Russian (RU): Даже не сказав об этом тёте Еве?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sem sequer falar para a tia Eva...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 連繪羽姑母都不知會一聲，就出去了…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 连绘羽姑母都不知会一声，就出去了…？

Umineko Project (UP): At this rate, it's only a matter of time before we start talking about leaving the guesthouse to search for them.
Steam (ST): At this rate, it's only a matter of time before we start planning to leave the guesthouse to go search for them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): このままでは、ゲストハウスを出て彼らを探しに行こうという話になるのも、時間の問題だろう。
Russian (RU): В таком случае это лишь вопрос времени, когда мы начнём говорить о выходе из домика для гостей на их поиски.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora é só uma questão de tempo até começarmos a falar em deixarmos a casa de hóspedes para ir procurá‐los.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 再這樣下去，發展成離開賓館，去外面找他們，也只是時間問題。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 再这样下去，发展成离开宾馆，去外面找他们，也只是时间问题。

Umineko Project (UP): .........At this point, I'd be in favor of that.
Steam (ST): ......When that time comes, I'll agree.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........When that time comes, I'll agree.
PC Japanese (JP): ………この期に及んでは、俺もそれに賛成だ。
Russian (RU): .........Когда дойдёт до этого, то я выскажусь за.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........A essa altura, eu sou a favor disso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………事到如今，我也贊成這麼做了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………事到如今，我也赞成这么做了。

Umineko Project (UP): We said that shutting ourselves up inside the guesthouse would be safe, and shut ourselves in this morning as a big, happy family of twelve people.
Steam (ST): We'd thought staying holed up in the guesthouse would be safe, which was why our big, happy group of 12 people locked themselves up here this morning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since shutting ourselves up inside the guesthouse should have been safe, we should have been a big, happy family of 12 people and stayed shut in since this morning.
PC Japanese (JP): ゲストハウスに閉じ篭ってれば安全だと言って、俺たちは今朝、１２人もの大所帯でここに閉じ篭ったはずなんだ。
Russian (RU): Поскольку отсидка внутри запертого домика для гостей должна была обеспечить безопасность, нам следовало быть большой, счастливой семьёй из 12 человек, оставаясь тут взаперти до самого утра.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós tínhamos dito que nos trancaríamos dentro da casa de hóspede para ficarmos seguros, e nos trancamos nessa manhã como uma grande família de doze pessoas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們今早說著，只要去賓館固守就安全了，而以十二人的大家庭閉門守在此處。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们今早说着，只要去宾馆固守就安全了，而以十二人的大家庭闭门守在此处。

Umineko Project (UP): And yet, now there are only four people here. ......In other words, being here does not imply safety...
Steam (ST): And yet, now there's only four of us left. ...That means staying here is no guarantee of safety...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And yet, now there were only four people here.......In other words, it means that being here is not safe...
PC Japanese (JP): なのにそれが、今やここには４人しかいない。……つまり、ここにいることが安全を意味したりはしないのだ…。
Russian (RU): И тем не менее, в настоящий момент здесь осталось всего лишь четыре человека. ......Другими словами, это означает, что здесь уже не безопасно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E mesmo assim, agora só tem quatro pessoas aqui. ......Em outras palavras, ficar aqui não significa ficarmos seguros...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，現在這裡卻只剩下了四個人。……換言之，待在這裡並不意味著安全…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，现在这里却只剩下了四个人。……换言之，待在这里并不意味着安全…。

Umineko Project (UP): However, ...there's something even more important that we mustn't forget.{n}That's the fact that all of the doors and windows were locked from the inside.
Steam (ST): However, ...there's one thing we can't afford to forget. All the doors and windows were locked from the inside.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, ...before that, there was something that we must not forget. That was the fact that all of the doors and windows were locked from the inside.
PC Japanese (JP): だが、…その前に忘れてはならないことがある。全ての扉と窓が内側から閉ざされているということだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だが、…その前に忘れてはならないことがある。{n}全ての扉と窓が内側から閉ざされているということだ。
Russian (RU): Однако... Первым делом нам важно было кое о чём не забывать.{n}А именно — тот факт, что все двери и окна были заперты изнутри.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, ...tem algo ainda mais importante que todos nós esquecemos.{n}O fato de que todas as portas e janelas estão trancadas por dentro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，…在去之前，還有一點不能忘。{n}所有的門與窗都從內側鎖得好好的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，…在去之前，还有一点不能忘。{n}所有的门与窗都从内侧锁得好好的。

Umineko Project (UP): ......This is a locked room.{n}How had they vanished from this place?
Steam (ST): ...This is a closed room. How did they manage to vanish from this place?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......This is a closed room. How had they hid themselves away from this place?
PC Japanese (JP): ……ここは密室なのだ。どうやって彼らはここから姿を消したというのか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……ここは密室なのだ。{n}どうやって彼らはここから姿を消したというのか。
Russian (RU): ......Это закрытое помещение.{n}Как им удалось покинуть это место?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Este é um quarto fechado.{n}Como eles desapareceram de um lugar como esse?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這是個密室。{n}他們是怎麼從這裡出去的？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这是个密室。{n}他们是怎么从这里出去的？

Umineko Project (UP): We'd searched around thoroughly.{n}However, we were unable to find any signs of anyone hiding.
Steam (ST): We searched around thoroughly. However, we couldn't find any traces of someone hiding.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We searched around thoroughly. However, we couldn't find any traces of someone hiding.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺たちは徹底的に探し回った。しかし、誰かが隠れている痕跡は見つけられなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺たちは徹底的に探し回った。{n}しかし、誰かが隠れている痕跡は見つけられなかった。
Russian (RU): Мы досконально всё осмотрели.{n}Но тем не менее так и не обнаружили никаких следов, указывающих, где они или кто‐либо ещё могли бы скрыться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós procuramos por todos os lugares.{n}Porém, não fomos capazes de encontrar nenhum sinal de qualquer pessoa se escondendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們徹徹底底地搜了個遍。{n}可是，完全沒發現有誰躲藏著的踪跡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们彻彻底底地搜了个遍。{n}可是，完全没发现有谁躲藏着的踪迹。

Umineko Project (UP): ...The three of them had almost certainly been taken outside the guesthouse.
Steam (ST): ...The three of them had almost certainly been taken outside the guesthouse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …ほぼ間違いなく、彼ら３人はゲストハウスの外へは連れ出されている。
Russian (RU): ...Эта троица почти наверняка находится за пределами домика для гостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Os três quase que certamente devem ter sido levados para fora da casa de hóspedes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …幾乎可以肯定，他們三人已被帶到了賓館外。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …几乎可以肯定，他们三人已被带到了宾馆外。

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Umineko Project (UP): ".........I wonder how they did it... You don't think......there might be something like a hidden door?"
Steam (ST): "......I wonder how it was done... You don't think...there might be something like a hidden door?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........I wonder how they did it... You don't think, ......there might be something like a hidden door?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………どうやってでしょう…。まさか、……隠し扉とかがあるとか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………どうやってでしょう…。まさか、……隠し扉とかがあるとか」
Russian (RU): ".........Мне интересно, как им удалось это сделать... Вы ведь не думаете... что здесь может существовать какая‐нибудь потайная дверь?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Eu me pergunto como ele fizeram isso... Você não acha......que exista algo como uma porta secreta?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………會是怎麼做的呢…？難道說，……是有類似於暗門的東西嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………会是怎么做的呢…？难道说，……是有类似于暗门的东西吗？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "A hidden door...?"
Steam (ST): "A hidden door...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「隠し扉…？」
Russian (RU): "Потайная дверь?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uma porta secreta...?"

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Umineko Project (UP): "...The doors and the windows are impossible to lock from the outside by construction. Even using a fishing line of some kind, it would probably be impossible with the way they are constructed. In that case, it's probably reasonable to think that they left through somewhere other than a door or a window..."
Steam (ST): "...The doors and the windows were built in a way that makes them impossible to lock from the outside. Even using a fish line, it would probably be impossible with the way they're constructed. So, it may be reasonable to assume that they left via something other than a door or a window..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...The doors and the windows were constructed so that it is impossible for them to be locked from the outside. Even using a fish line, it would probably be impossible with the way it is constructed. In that case, it may be appropriate to think that they left through somewhere other than the door or a window..."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......When we went down the stairs, Eva oba-san and Jessica were enraged, and were each persistent in their desire to leave this place and search for their respective families.
PC Japanese (JP): ……下へ降りると、絵羽伯母さんと朱志香は憤り、それぞれの家族を探すためにここを出ようと気炎を上げていた。
Russian (RU): ......Когда мы спустились вниз по лестнице, тётя Ева и Джессика были на взводе, и упрямо желали как можно скорее покинуть это место и начать поиски своих семей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Quando descemos as escadas, a tia Eva e a Jessica estavam irritadas, fazendo muito barulho sobre deixar esse lugar e procurar por suas respectivas famílias.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……下樓一看，繪羽姑母與朱志香兩人為了尋找各自的家人，都火氣十足地要從這裡出去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……下楼一看，绘羽姑母与朱志香两人为了寻找各自的家人，都火气十足地要从这里出去。

Umineko Project (UP): It was a desire that naturally hits those who can no longer see their family.
Steam (ST): It was a desire that naturally hits those who can no longer see their family.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was a desire that naturally hits those who can no longer see their family.
PC Japanese (JP): 家族の姿が見えなくなれば、駆られて当然の欲求だ。
Russian (RU): Это было вполне естественным желанием для тех, кто больше не мог увидеть свою семью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era um desejo que naturalmente atingia aqueles que não podiam mais ver suas famílias.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是只要家人不見踪影，人就會受其支配的當然的欲求。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是只要家人不见踪影，人就会受其支配的当然的欲求。

Umineko Project (UP): Auntie Eva told Doctor Nanjo and me to stay here, but I shook my head and started walking.
Steam (ST): Aunt Eva told Doctor Nanjo and me to stay here, but I shook my head and started walking.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva oba-san told Doctor Nanjo and me to stay here, but I shook my head and started walking.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんは、俺と南條先生にここに残るように言うが、俺は首を横に振り、歩み出た。
Russian (RU): Тётя Ева сказала, чтобы я и доктор Нанджо оставались здесь, но я отрицательно покачал головой и тоже пошёл.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Eva disse para mim e para o doutor Nanjo ficarmos aqui, mas eu balancei minha cabeça e comecei a andar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然繪羽姑母叫我與南條大夫留在這裡，但我搖了搖頭，抬起了腳步。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然绘羽姑母叫我与南条大夫留在这里，但我摇了摇头，抬起了脚步。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): ".........I've had enough of being shut up in here. ...I've started wanting to breathe some outside air."
Steam (ST): "......I've been shut up inside for a long time already. ...I've started wanting to breathe some outside air."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........I've been shut up inside for a long time already. ...I've started wanting to breathe some outside air."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………もう、引き篭もりはたくさんだぜ。…俺も外の空気を吸いたくなってきた。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………もう、引き篭りはたくさんだぜ。…俺も外の空気を吸いたくなってきた」
Russian (RU): ".........Я и так уже провёл взаперти уйму времени. ...Хочу тоже подышать свежим воздухом."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Já tive o bastante de ficar preso aqui dentro. ...Estou ficando com você de respirar um pouco do ar da rua."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………早就在這兒蹲夠了。…我也想去呼吸外面的空氣啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………早就在这儿蹲够了。…我也想去呼吸外面的空气啊。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah, and if we're going, let's go right now...!! I'm sick as hell of staying shut up in this place...!! Let's go and find Mom, Dad, and George nii‐san as fast as we can...!!"
Steam (ST): "Yeah, if we're going, let's go quickly...!! There's no way I'm gonna keep myself shut up in a place like this any more...!! Let's go and find Mom, Dad, and George nii-san right now...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Sure, if you're going, let's go quickly...!! There's no way I'm gonna keep myself shut up in a place like this any more...!! Let's go and find Mom, Dad, and George nii-san quickly...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あぁ、行くならさっさと行こうぜ…！！　もうこんなところに閉じこもってるのは真っ平さ…！！　早く父さんや母さんや、譲治兄さんを探しに行こう…！！」
Russian (RU): "Конечно, если собираешься идти, то поживее! Не желаю больше сидеть взаперти в этом месте! Идёмте искать маму, папу и Джорджа нии‐сана, скорее!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, e se formos, vamos todos juntos...!! Já estou farta de ficar presa nesse lugar...!! Vamos encontrar meus pais e o George nii‐san o mais rápido que pudermos...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊啊，要走就快走…！！我再也受不了被關在這種地方了…！！趕快去找爸爸媽媽與讓治哥…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊啊，要走就快走…！！我再也受不了被关在这种地方了…！！赶快去找爸爸妈妈与让治哥…！！」

Umineko Project (UP): The blood had all risen to Jessica's head.{n}...I hope it doesn't set off her asthma.
Steam (ST): The blood had all risen to Jessica's head. ...I hope it doesn't set off her asthma.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The blood had all risen to Jessica's head....I hope it doesn't set off her asthma.
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香はすっかり頭に血が上ってしまっている。…喘息の発作にならなければいいのだが。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 朱志香はすっかり頭に血が上ってしまっている。{n}…喘息の発作にならなければいいのだが。
Russian (RU): Вся кровь ударила Джессике в голову.{n}...Я надеюсь, её не хватит приступ астмы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O sangue subiu por completo à cabeça de Jessica.{n}...Eu espero que isso não desencadeie sua asma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朱志香已完全熱血衝頭。{n}…但願別因此引發哮喘。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朱志香已完全热血冲头。{n}…但愿别因此引发哮喘。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "Anyone who wants to stay behind can do that themselves. But we are going to search outside...!"
Steam (ST): "If anyone wants to stay, go ahead and stay. We'll be searching outside...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Anyone who wants to stay can just stay. Anyways, we're searching outside...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「残りたい人は勝手に残ってればいいわ。とにかく私たちは表を探してくるわ…！」
Russian (RU): "Любой желающий может остаться. В любом случае, мы отправляемся наружу!..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Qualquer um que queira ficar para trás pode fazer isso por conta. Mas nós estamos indo procurar lá fora...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「想留在這裡的人，就自己留下好了。總之，我們要去外面找了…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「想留在这里的人，就自己留下好了。总之，我们要去外面找了…！」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "What about you, Doctor Nanjo...? Gonna watch the place by yourself...?"
Steam (ST): "What about you, Doctor Nanjo...? Will you watch the place by yourself...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "What about you, Doctor Nanjo...? Will you watch the place by yourself...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「南條先生はどうする…？　ひとりで留守番してるかい…？」
Russian (RU): "Как насчёт вас, доктор Нанджо?.. Вы собираетесь остаться в этом месте один?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E quanto a você, Doutor Nanjo...? Vai ficar cuidando daqui sozinho...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「南條大夫要怎麼辦…？一個人看家嗎…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「南条大夫要怎么办…？一个人看家吗…？」

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Umineko Project (UP): "N‐no... Please allow me to join you..."
Steam (ST): "N-No... Allow me to join you..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "N, no... Allow me to join you..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「い、いえ…。私もご一緒させてください…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「い、いえ…。私もご一緒させてください…」
Russian (RU): "Н‐нет... Позвольте мне присоединиться к вам..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "N‐Não... Por favor, me permitam ir com vocês..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不、不…。請允許我與大家一起去…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不、不…。请允许我与大家一起去…」

Umineko Project (UP): If the alternative was holing up alone in a guesthouse whose security was by no means guaranteed, it would be better to be in a danger zone as a group of four people.
Steam (ST): Rather than holing up alone in a guesthouse whose security was by no means guaranteed, it would be better to enter a danger zone as a group of four people.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rather than holing up alone in a guesthouse whose security was by no means guaranteed, it would be better to be in a danger zone as a group of four people.
PC Japanese (JP): 安全がまったく保証されていないゲストハウスにひとりで篭るくらいなら、危険地帯ではあっても４人一緒の方がまだマシだろう。
Russian (RU): Чем оставаться одному в домике для гостей, безопасность которого оказалась под сомнением, предпочтительней было находиться в опасной зоне, но в группе из четырёх человек.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se a alternativa era permanecer sozinho na casa de hóspedes onde a segurança não era garantida, seria melhor ficar em uma zona de perigo com quatro pessoas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與其獨自守在全無安全保證的賓館，還不如四人一起去危險地帶吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与其独自守在全无安全保证的宾馆，还不如四人一起去危险地带吧。

Umineko Project (UP): Auntie Eva was holding the gun. Moving separately from her was almost like asking to be made into the next victim.
Steam (ST): Aunt Eva had a gun. Moving separately from her was almost like asking to be made into the next victim.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva oba-san was holding a gun. Moving separately from her was almost like asking to be made into the next victim.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんは銃を持っている。彼女と行動を別にするのは、自分を次の犠牲者にしてくれと名乗り出るようなものだ。
Russian (RU): Тётя Ева сжимала в руках ружьё. Находиться сейчас раздельно с ней было всё равно, что выставить себя следующей жертвой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Eva estava segurando uma arma. Se mover separadamente era quase como pedir para se tornar a próxima vítima.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽姑母拿著槍。與她分頭行動，等同於自告奮勇地充當下一個犧牲者。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽姑母拿着枪。与她分头行动，等同于自告奋勇地充当下一个牺牲者。

Umineko Project (UP): In this way, the four of us decided to leave the guesthouse.
Steam (ST): In this way, the four of us decided to leave the guesthouse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In this way, the four of us decided to leave the guesthouse.
PC Japanese (JP): こうして俺たち４人はゲストハウスを出ることになった。
Russian (RU): Таким образом, мы вчетвером решили покинуть домик для гостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Visto isso, nós quatro decidimos deixar a casa de hóspedes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們四人就這樣決定了，離開賓館。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们四人就这样决定了，离开宾馆。

Umineko Project (UP): ......We'd barricaded ourselves in, saying we'd be safe if we did, ......and then lost eight people.
Steam (ST): ...Even though it should have been safe to barricade ourselves here, ...we lost eight people after doing so.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Even though it should have been safe to barricade ourselves here, we did that, ......and then lost eight people.
PC Japanese (JP): ……ここに篭城すれば安全と言って俺たちは篭り、……そして８人を失った。
Russian (RU): ......Хотя мы были уверены в безопасности этого места и даже соорудили здесь баррикаду... После этого мы потеряли восемь человек.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Nós nos trancamos aqui, dizendo que ficaríamos seguros fazendo isso, ......e agora perdemos oito pessoas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……說著“在這裡籠城就安全了”的我們，……在這裡固守，然後失去了八人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……说着“在这里笼城就安全了”的我们，……在这里固守，然后失去了八人。

Umineko Project (UP): It was almost as though this had been nothing more than a holding cell from which the sacrifices could be killed one after another.
Steam (ST): It was almost as though it this was a holding cell from which the sacrifices could be killed one after another.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was almost as though it was a holding room so that the sacrifices could be killed one after another.
PC Japanese (JP): それはまるで、生贄を順番に殺すための控え室でしかなかったかのようだ。
Russian (RU): Это было подобно нахождению в клетке, в которой жертв убивают одну за другой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É quase como se isso não fosse nada mais do que uma cela onde os sacrifícios poderiam ser mortos um após o outro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 簡直就像，這裡僅僅只是一間，將人按順序拖走獻祭的候宰室。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 简直就像，这里仅仅只是一间，将人按顺序拖走献祭的候宰室。

Umineko Project (UP): We removed the chain, unlocked the front door, and opened it.
Steam (ST): We removed the chain, unlocked the front door and opened it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We removed the chain, unlocked the front door and opened it.
PC Japanese (JP): チェーンを外し、鍵を開けて玄関の扉を開く。
Russian (RU): Мы убрали цепочку, отомкнули входную дверь и распахнули её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós removemos a corrente, destrancamos a porta da frente, e então a abrimos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 取下鏈條，開鎖，打開大門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 取下链条，开锁，打开大门。

Umineko Project (UP): It was already pitch black out. While there were some lights outside which dimly lit the pathway, ......they didn't have enough power to illuminate the darkness that some suspicious person was likely to be hiding in.
Steam (ST): It was already pitch black. While there were some lights outside that dimly lit the pathway, ...they didn't have enough power to pierce the darkness that some suspicious person might be hiding in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was already pitch black. While there were some lights outside which dimly lit the pathway, ......they didn't have enough power to shine into the darkness that some suspicious person might be hiding in.
PC Japanese (JP): もう辺りは真っ暗だ。表には、一応、外灯があり、足元をそこそこには照らしてくれるが、……不審者が潜んでいそうな暗闇を照らし出すほどの力はない。
Russian (RU): На дворе уже царила кромешная тьма. Несмотря на редкие огни снаружи, тускло освещавшие дорогу, они светили недостаточно сильно, чтобы можно было высветить из темноты возможные скрывающиеся в ней лица.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Estava completamente escuro. Apesar de haver algumas luzes que iluminavam o caminho de forma escassa, ......elas não tinham poder o suficiente para iluminar a escuridão na qual uma pessoa suspeita poderia usar para se esconder.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 附近已是一片漆黑。雖然外面也有路燈，為我們勉強照亮了腳下，……但其燈光並不足以照亮也許潛藏著可疑之人的黑暗。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 附近已是一片漆黑。虽然外面也有路灯，为我们勉强照亮了脚下，……但其灯光并不足以照亮也许潜藏着可疑之人的黑暗。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm going...! If you fall behind, you're on your own, okay...?!"
Steam (ST): "I'm going...! If you fall behind, you're on your own, okay...?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「行くわよ…！　遅れても知らないんだからね…？！」
Russian (RU): "Я иду!... Если отстанете, то будете сами за себя, ясно?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Estou indo...! Se ficarem para trás, fiquem por conta própria, entenderam...?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「走了…！跟不上可不管哦…？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): Still holding her gun, Auntie Eva dashed out without an umbrella.
Steam (ST): Still holding her gun, Aunt Eva dashed out without an umbrella.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Still holding her gun, Eva oba-san dashed out without an umbrella.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんが、銃を構えたまま、傘も差さずに飛び出していく。
Russian (RU): Всё ещё сжимая своё ружьё, тётя Ева выскочила без зонта.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Segurando sua arma, a tia Eva correu para fora sem um guarda‐chuva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽姑母舉著槍，連傘都不撐地飛奔了出去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽姑母举着枪，连伞都不撑地飞奔了出去。

Umineko Project (UP): Jessica followed after her.
Steam (ST): Jessica followed after her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Jessica followed after her.
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香もその後に続く。
Russian (RU): Джессика последовала за ней.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Jessica seguiu atrás dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朱志香跟在了她的身後。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朱志香跟在了她的身后。

Umineko Project (UP): After looking at each other, Doctor Nanjo and I chased after them.
Steam (ST): After glancing at each other, Doctor Nanjo and I chased after them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After looking at each other, Doctor Nanjo and I chased after them.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺と南條先生は顔を見合わせてから、二人のあとに続き、駆け出すのだった。
Russian (RU): Переглянувшись друг с другом, доктор Нанджо и я бросились следом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após olharmos um para o outro, eu e o doutor Nanjo fomos atrás delas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我與南條大夫互相對視了一眼後，也跟著她們跑了出去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我与南条大夫互相对视了一眼后，也跟着她们跑了出去。

Umineko Project (UP): ...What in the world is happening in this mansion, on this island?
Steam (ST): ...What in the world is happening in this mansion, on this island?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): …一体、この屋敷では、この島では、何が起こってるっていうんだ。
Russian (RU): ...Что же, чёрт возьми, творится в этом особняке, на этом острове?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...O que diabos está acontecendo nesta mansão, nesta ilha?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …到底在大屋，在島上，是發生了什麼啊？
Chinese Simplified (CN): …到底在大屋，在岛上，是发生了什么啊？

Umineko Project (UP): Since yesterday, I've just been shut up in the cousins' room in the guesthouse with the rest of my cousins. So I don't know anything about what's been going on outside.
Steam (ST): I've just been shut up in the guesthouse with the rest of the cousins since yesterday. So I don't know anything about what's going on outside.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I've just been shut up in the guesthouse with the rest of the cousins since yesterday. So I don't know anything about what's going on outside.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺はいとこみんなで、昨日からずっとゲストハウスのいとこ部屋に篭っているだけだ。だからその外のことは何もわからない。
Russian (RU): Я лишь был заперт в домике для гостей с остальными родственниками ещё со вчерашнего дня. Поэтому мне ничего не известно о том, что происходит снаружи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Desde ontem, eu tenho estado trancado no quarto dos primos na casa de hóspedes com o resto dos meus primos. Por isso eu não sei nada sobre o que está acontecendo aqui fora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我從昨天起，就與幾個堂兄妹一起，一直只是傻傻地蹲在堂兄妹房間之中。所以，完全不知道外面發生的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我从昨天起，就与几个堂兄妹一起，一直只是傻傻地蹲在堂兄妹房间之中。所以，完全不知道外面发生的事。

Umineko Project (UP): Just what has been happening in those places I don't know about...outside the room, in the mansion, and on this island?
Steam (ST): Just what is happening that I don't know about... outside this room, in the mansion, on this island?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just what is happening that I don't know about... outside this room, in the mansion, on this island?
PC Japanese (JP): 一体、俺の知らない、部屋の外では、屋敷では、そしてこの島では何が起こっているっていうんだ。
Russian (RU): Что же происходит, о чём я не знаю... Снаружи этой комнаты, в особняке, на этом острове?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, o que aconteceu nesses lugares que eu desconheço...fora do quarto, na mansão, nesta ilha?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 到底在我所不知道的房間外、大屋裡，還有這個島上，發生了什麼啊？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 到底在我所不知道的房间外、大屋里，还有这个岛上，发生了什么啊？

Umineko Project (UP): ......Everything is occurring, everything is proceeding, ...and everything is ending without my knowing it.
Steam (ST): ...Everything is happening, everything is proceeding, ...and everything is ending without my knowing it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Everything is happening, everything is proceeding, ...and everything is ending without my knowing it.
PC Japanese (JP): ……俺に与り知れないうちに全てが起こり、全てが進み、…そして、全てが終わろうとしている。
Russian (RU): ......Всё что происходит, идёт своим чередом... И приближается к развязке, оставляя меня в неведении.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Tudo está ocorrendo, tudo está progredindo, ...e tudo está terminando sem o meu conhecimento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……一切都在我渾然不知時發生、進展，…然後，邁向終幕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……一切都在我浑然不知时发生、进展，…然后，迈向终幕。

Umineko Project (UP): Somewhere in my heart, I had already begun to give up.
Steam (ST): Somewhere in my heart, I've already started giving up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Somewhere in my heart, I have already begun to give up.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺は心のどこかで、すでに諦め始めていた。
Russian (RU): Где‐то в душе я уже готов был смириться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em algum lugar do meu coração, eu já havia começado a desistir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我心中的某處，已經開始聽天由命了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我心中的某处，已经开始听天由命了。

Umineko Project (UP): ...Most likely, ......not one of us will see tomorrow morning.
Steam (ST): ...Most likely, ...not one of us will see tomorrow morning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …俺たちはおそらく、……誰一人、明日の朝を迎えられはしないだろう。
Russian (RU): ...Вполне возможно... Ни один из нас не увидит завтрашнего утра.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Provavelmente, ......nenhum de nós verá a próxima manhã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …我們恐怕，……沒有一人能迎來明天的早晨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …我们恐怕，……没有一人能迎来明天的早晨。

Umineko Project (UP): When the seagulls cry, none shall be left alive...
Steam (ST): When the seagulls cry, nobody will be left alive...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When the seagulls cry, nobody will be left alive...
PC Japanese (JP): うみねこのなく頃に、誰も生き残れはしない…。
Russian (RU): Когда заголосят чайки, никого не останется в живых...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando as gaivotas chorarem, ninguém terá sobrevivido...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 誰都沒法活到，海貓鳴泣之時…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 谁都没法活到，海猫鸣泣之时…。
